Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte geliyo kataman woi qeeri kataman ubban inttena mokkanau ufaittiyai oonakkonne akeekan xomoosite; intte hegaappe kiyana gakkanaashin, aagan uttite.

English Sentences: And when ye come into an house, salute it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi soo geliiddi sarotite.

English Sentences: And if the house be worthy, let your peace come upon it: but if it be not worthy, let your peace return to you.
Wolaitta Sentences: He keettan de7iya asai inttena mokkikko, intte sarotido sarotai eta gakko. SHin eti inttena mokkennan ixxikko, intte sarotido sarotai intteyyo guyye simmo.

English Sentences: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear your words, when ye depart out of that house or city, shake off the dust of your feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi issi issi keettai woi katamai inttena mokkennan woi intte yootiyoobaa siyennan ixxikko, he keettaappe woi he katamaappe kiyiiddi, intte tohuwaappe buhiyaa shocite.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment, than for that city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; Xoossai pirddaa gallassi he katamaa asatuppe, Sadooma katamaa asaunne Gamoora katamaa asau pirddaa kehissana.

English Sentences: Behold, I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves: be ye therefore wise as serpents, and harmless as doves.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Be7ite! Taani inttena dorssaa wanggireello giddo yeddiyoogaadan yeddais. Hegaa gishshau, shooshshadan cincca gidite; qassi haraphphedan, ashkke gidite.

English Sentences: But beware of men: for they will deliver you up to the councils, and they will scourge you in their synagogues;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asappe naagettite. Aissi giikko, asi inttena pirdda keettau aattidi immana; qassi ba Aihuda woosa keettatunkka inttena lissuwan garafana.

English Sentences: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them and the Gentiles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Deriyaa haariyaageetu sinttaaninne kawotu sinttan ta gishshau intte eqqidi, etassinne Aihuda gidenna asaassi wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootana.

English Sentences: But when they deliver you up, take no thought how or what ye shall speak: for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti inttena pirddau aattiyo wode, intte haasayanabaa he saatiyan Xoossai intteyyo immiyo gishshau, intte gaanabaunne woi woigi haasayanaakkonne hirggoppite.

English Sentences: For it is not ye that speak, but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, inttenan de7idi haasayiyai intte Aawaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaa gidiyoogaappe attin, haasayiyaageeti inttena gidekketa.

English Sentences: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death, and the father the child: and the children shall rise up against their parents, and cause them to be put to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ishai ba ishaa, aawai ba na7aa worissana; naati bantta aawatu bollinne bantta aayetu bolli denddidi, eta worissana.

English Sentences: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that endureth to the end shall be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi asai ubbai inttena ta sunttaa gishshau ixxana; shin wurssettai gakkanaashin gencciyaagee attana.

English Sentences: But when they persecute you in this city, flee ye into another: for verily I say unto you, Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel, till the Son of man be come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti inttena issi katamaappe yedettikko, hara katamaa baqatite. Aissi giikko, taani intteyyo tumaa gais; taani, Asa Na7ai, yaana gakkanaashin, intte intte oosuwaa Israa7eela katama ubban ootti wurssekketa.

English Sentences: The disciple is not above his master, nor the servant above his lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tamaariyaagee bana tamaarissiyaagaappe darenna; ashkkaraikka ba godaappe darenna.

English Sentences: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord. If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub, how much more shall they call them of his household?
Wolaitta Sentences: Tamaariyaagee bana tamaarissiyaagaa keeni gidiyoogee, ashkkaraikka ba godaa keeni gidiyoogee au gidana; eti keettaawaa Bi7eeli-Zeebula giidi xeesikko, a so asaa ai keenaa mooridi xeesaneeshsha!

English Sentences: Fear them not therefore: for there is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed; and hid, that shall not be known.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi asassi yayyoppite; aissi giikko, gentti wottidobai qoncciyaa kiyennan attenna; qottidobaikka erettennan attenna.

English Sentences: What I tell you in darkness, that speak ye in light: and what ye hear in the ear, that preach ye upon the housetops.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo xuman odiyoobaa poo7uwan haasayite; intteyyo haittan saasukkidi odidobaa, keettaa huuphiyan awaajjite.

English Sentences: And fear not them which kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul: but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ashuwaa woriyaageetuyyo yayyoppite; eti shemppuwaa woranau danddayokkona. SHin shemppuwaanne ashuwaa Gaannabiyan xaissanau danddayiya Xoossaassi yayyite.

English Sentences: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77u siine kafoti bakkannan baizettokkonaayye? Intte Aawai gaana xayikko, he siine kafotuppe issinniyaakka sa7an wodhdhukku.

English Sentences: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin harai atto, intte huuphiyan de7iya binnaana ubbaikka qoodan de7ees.

English Sentences: Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi yayyoppite; daro siine kafotuppe intte aadhdheeta.

English Sentences: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, asa sinttan tabaa markkattiya ooyyo gidikkonne, taanikka saluwan de7iya ta Aawaa sinttan markkattana;

English Sentences: But whosoever shall deny me before men, him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin asa sinttan tana kaddiya oonanne taanikka qassi saluwan de7iya ta Aawaa sinttan a kaddana.

English Sentences: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth: I came not to send peace, but a sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani sa7aassi sarotettaa ehaanau yiidobaa inttessi milatoppo; taani tooraa ehaanau yiidoogaappe attin, sarotettaa ehaanau yabeikke.

English Sentences: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani na7aa a aawaappe, na7iyo i aayeeppe, na7aa machchiyookka i bolloteeppe shaakkanau yaas;

English Sentences: And a man's foes shall be they of his own household.
Wolaitta Sentences: asassi morkketi a so asata gidana.

English Sentences: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me: and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo taappe aattidi siiqiyaagee tabaa gidanau bessenna; ba attuma na7a woi ba macca na7iyo taappe aattidi siiqiyaagee tabaa gidanau bessenna.

English Sentences: And he that taketh not his cross, and followeth after me, is not worthy of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi, ta geeduwaa kaallennaagee tabaa gidanau bessenna.

English Sentences: He that findeth his life shall lose it: and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba shemppuwaa ashshiyaagee bashshana; shin ta gishshau ba shemppuwaa bashshiyaagee ashshana.

English Sentences: He that receiveth you receiveth me, and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttena mokkiyaagee tana mokkees; qassi tana mokkiyaagee tana kiittidaagaa mokkees.

English Sentences: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet's reward; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man's reward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiyaagaa hananabaa yootiyaagaa sunttan mokkiyaagee, hananabaa yootiyaagaa woituwaa aara shaakkana; qassi xilluwaa xilluwaa sunttan mokkiyaagee, xilluwaa woituwaa aara shaakkana.

English Sentences: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple, verily I say unto you, he shall in no wise lose his reward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne ha ta erissiyo ashkkaratuppe guuxxiya issuwau tana kaalliyaagee a gidiyo gishshau, harai atto bule haatta xalaalaa uyanau immikkokka, taani intteyyo tumaa gais; i ba woituwaa ekkana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples, he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata azaziyoogaa polido wode, hegaappe denddidi, katamatun tamaarissanaunne yootanau biis.

English Sentences: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ, he sent two of his disciples,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xammaqiya Yohaannisi qasho keettan de7iiddi, Yesuusi oottidobaa siyidi, ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe akko kiittidi,

English Sentences: And said unto him, Art thou he that should come, or do we look for another?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaanaagee neneeyye? Woi nuuni haraa naaganee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto them, Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see:
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi, etayyo hagaadan yaagiis; "Biidi intte be7iyoogaanne siyiyoogaa Yohaannisau yootite;

English Sentences: The blind receive their sight, and the lame walk, the lepers are cleansed, and the deaf hear, the dead are raised up, and the poor have the gospel preached to them.
Wolaitta Sentences: qooqeti xeelloosona; wobbeti hemettoosona; inchchirichchai oiqqidoogeeti paxoosona; tulleti siyoosona; haiqqidaageeti denddoosona; hiyyeesati wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa siyoosona.

English Sentences: And blessed is he, whosoever shall not be offended in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana sirenna urai anjjettidaagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as they departed, Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John, What went ye out into the wilderness to see? A reed shaken with the wind?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati guyye simmidi biishin, Yesuusi Yohaannisabaa shiiqida asaassi hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis; "Ai be7anau bazzo kiyidetii? Carkkoi qaattiyo shombboquwaa be7anau kiyidetiiyye?

English Sentences: But what went ye out for to see? A man clothed in soft raiment? behold, they that wear soft clothing are in kings' houses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, ai be7anau kiyidetii? Lo77iya maayuwaa maayida bitaniyaa be7anau kiyidetiiyye? Lo77iya maayuwaa maayiyaageeti kawotu keettan de7oosona.

English Sentences: But what went ye out for to see? A prophet? yea, I say unto you, and more than a prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, ai be7anau kiyidetii? Hananabaa yootiyaagaa be7anau kiyidetii? Ee, taani intteyyo odais; hananabaa yootiyaagaappekka aadhdhiyaagaa be7ideta.

English Sentences: For this is he, of whom it is written, Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, which shall prepare thy way before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossaa maxaafan, Xoossai, "Be7a, ta kiittiyoogaa taani neeppe sinttau yeddana. I neeyyo ogiyaa kessana" yaagees. geetettidi Yohaannisabai xaafettiis.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist: notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; aayee uluwaappe yelettida asa ubban Xammaqiya Yohaannisappe aadhdhiya ooninne de7ibeenna; shin saluwaa kawotettan ubbaappe laafiyaageekka appe aadhdhana.

English Sentences: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xammaqiya Yohaannisa wodiyaappe doommidi, hachchi gakkanaashin, saluwaa kawotettai daro naaqettees; wolqqaama asati wolqqan a ekkoosona.

English Sentences: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, hananabaa yootiya ubbatinne Muuse higgee Yohaannisa wode gakkanaashin, kawotettaabaa haasayidosona;

English Sentences: And if ye will receive it, this is Elias, which was for to come.
Wolaitta Sentences: intte eta kiitaa ammananabaa gidikko, yaana giido Eelaasi ha Yohaannisa.

English Sentences: He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi siyiya haitti de7iyoogee siyo!

English Sentences: But whereunto shall I liken this generation? It is like unto children sitting in the markets, and calling unto their fellows,
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin taani ha wodiyaa asaa aibiira leemisoo? Eti qocan uttiya naata milatoosona; eti bantta laggeta xeesidi,

English Sentences: And saying, We have piped unto you, and ye have not danced; we have mourned unto you, and ye have not lamented.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni intteyyo cachcha zayiyaa punnida; shin duribeekketa; yeeho yettaakka kessida; shin yeekkibeekketa yaagoosona.

English Sentences: For John came neither eating nor drinking, and they say, He hath a devil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Yohaannisi xoomiiddinne woine eessa uyennan yin eti, A bolli xalahee de7ees yaagidosona.

English Sentences: The Son of man came eating and drinking, and they say, Behold a man gluttonous, and a winebibber, a friend of publicans and sinners. But wisdom is justified of her children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, Asa Na7ai, maiddanne uyaidda yin, eti tana, Ha yoraanne woine eessaa uyiyaagaa be7ite; giiraa ekkiyaageetuuranne nagaranchchatuura siiqettees yaagoosona; shin Xoossaa aadhdhida eratettai ba oosuwan tuma gididi beettees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done, because they repented not:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi ba malaataappe dariya baggaa oottido katamatun de7iya asai bantta nagaraappe simmibeenna gishshau, eta hagaadan yaagidi, boruwaa doommiis;

English Sentences: Woe unto thee, Chorazin! woe unto thee, Bethsaida! for if the mighty works, which were done in you, had been done in Tyre and Sidon, they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Koraaziine katamau, neeyyo aayye7ana; Beetasaida katamau, neeyyookka aayye7ana; aissi giikko, intte bolli Xoossai oottido malaatai Xiiroosa katamaaninne Sidoona kataman oosettidobaa gidiyaakko, eti waaruwaa maayidi, bidinttaa tisttettidi, beni bantta nagaraappe simmanaagaa shin.

English Sentences: But I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment, than for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo odais; pirddaa gallassi Xoossai intteppe Xiiroosa katamaunne Sidoona katamau pirddaa kehissana.

English Sentences: And thou, Capernaum, which art exalted unto heaven, shalt be brought down to hell: for if the mighty works, which have been done in thee, had been done in Sodom, it would have remained until this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Qifirinaahooma katamau, neeni saluwaa pude xoqqu gaanau koyadii? Neeni Si7ooliyaa duge yegettana; aissi giikko, ne bolli Xoossai oottido malaatai Sadooma kataman oosettidobaa gidiyaakko, Sadooma katamai hachchi gakkanaassikka de7anaagaa shin.

English Sentences: But I say unto you, That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment, than for thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo odais; pirddaa gallassi Xoossai neeppe Sadoomayyo pirddaa kehissana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: At that time Jesus answered and said, I thank thee, O Father, Lord of heaven and earth, because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them unto babes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wode zaaridi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Ta Aawau, saluwaa sa7aa Godau, neeni hagaa aadhdhida eranchchatuppenne akeekanchchatuppe genttada, erenna naatussi qonccissido gishshau, nena galatais;

English Sentences: Even so, Father: for so it seemed good in thy sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: ee ta Aawau, aissi giikko, hagee ne shenedan oosettiis.

English Sentences: All things are delivered unto me of my Father: and no man knoweth the Son, but the Father; neither knoweth any man the Father, save the Son, and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta Aawai taassi ubbabaa immiis; Aawaappe harai Na7aa erenna; Na7aappenne Na7ai Aawaa bessanau koyiyo asatuppe attin, harai Aawaa erenna.

English Sentences: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Daafuranchchatoo, deexuwaa tookkiyaageetoo, ubbati taakko haa yiite; taani inttena shemppissana.

English Sentences: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ashkkenne wozanappe kauyyiyaagaa gidido gishshau, ta qambbaran waaxettite; taappe tamaarite; intte shemppuwaukka intte shemppo demmana.

English Sentences: For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta qambbarai giiga; qassi taani inttena toossidoogeekka kaushsha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn; and his disciples were an hungred, and began to pluck the ears of corn, and to eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wode Sambbata gallassi, tiya bangga giddoora aadhdhees. Aadhdhishin i erissiyo ashkkarati namisettidi, tiya banggaa duuttidi, muussaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: But when the Pharisees saw it, they said unto him, Behold, thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Parisaaweti hegaa be7idi Yesuusa, "Be7a, ne erissiyo ashkkarati Sambbata gallassi oottanau higge gidennabaa oottoosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he said unto them, Have ye not read what David did, when he was an hungred, and they that were with him;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi etassi hagaadan yaagiis; "Daawitinne aara de7iyaageeti namisettido wode, Daawiti oottidobaa nabbabibeekketii?

English Sentences: How he entered into the house of God, and did eat the shewbread, which was not lawful for him to eat, neither for them which were with him, but only for the priests?
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Xoossaa keettaa gelidi, qeesetu xalaalai maanaappe attin, inne aara de7iyaageeti maanau higge gidennaagaa Xoossaassi yarshshido oittaa miidi, banaara de7iyaageetussikka immiis.

English Sentences: Or have ye not read in the law, how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath, and are blameless?
Wolaitta Sentences: Woi Sambbata ubban Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya qeeseti Sambbataa higgiyaa mooriyoogaa, qassi menttidi eti borettennaagaa Muuse higgiyan nabbabibeekketii?

English Sentences: But I say unto you, That in this place is one greater than the temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani intteyyo odais; Beeta Maqidasiyaappe aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees.

English Sentences: But if ye had known what this meaneth, I will have mercy, and not sacrifice, ye would not have condemned the guiltless.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa maxaafai, Taani maarotettaa koyaisippe attin, yarshshuwaa koyikke giyoogee woigiyoogaakko intte eriyaakko, nagari bainna asa bolli pirddekketa.

English Sentences: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani, Asa Na7ai, Sambbataa Godaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he was departed thence, he went into their synagogue:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaappe denddidi, Aihuda woosa keettaa biis.

English Sentences: And, behold, there was a man which had his hand withered. And they asked him, saying, Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days? that they might accuse him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan kushee gunddido issi bitanee de7ees; Yesuusa mootana koyiya asati, "Sambbatan, pattiyoogee higgee?" yaagidi a oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, What man shall there be among you, that shall have one sheep, and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day, will he not lay hold on it, and lift it out?
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi eta, "Intte giddon issi dorssi de7iyo urai, he dorssai Sambbata gallassi aafuwan kunddikko, oiqqidi kessennai oonee?

English Sentences: How much then is a man better than a sheep? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, asi dorssappe waani keehi darennee! Hegaa gishshau, Sambbata gallassi lo77obaa oottiyoogee higge" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then saith he to the man, Stretch forth thine hand. And he stretched it forth; and it was restored whole, like as the other.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan bitaniyaa, "Ne kushiyaa piddi ootta" yaagin bitanee piddi oottin, a kushee hinkko kushiyaadankka paxi aggiis.

English Sentences: Then the Pharisees went out, and held a council against him, how they might destroy him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Parisaaweti kare kiyidi, Yesuusa waati woranaakko maqettidosona.

English Sentences: But when Jesus knew it, he withdrew himself from thence: and great multitudes followed him, and he healed them all;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta zoretaa eridi, he sohuwaappe aggidi biishin, daro asai a kaalliis; harggida ubbaa pattiis.

English Sentences: And charged them that they should not make him known:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasa baggaara giidoogee polettana mala,

English Sentences: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asatuyyo, "Tabaa hara asassi yootoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Behold my servant, whom I have chosen; my beloved, in whom my soul is well pleased: I will put my spirit upon him, and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Isiyaasa baggaara hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani doorido ta ashkkarai, taani siiqiyo, tana ufaissiyaagee hageeho. Taani ta Ayyaanaa a bolli wottana. I suure pirddaa Aihuda gidenna asa ubbau yootana.

English Sentences: He shall not strive, nor cry; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets.
Wolaitta Sentences: I palamettenna; woi wocamenna. Ba qaalaakka ogiyan sissenna.

English Sentences: A bruised reed shall he not break, and smoking flax shall he not quench, till he send forth judgment unto victory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Suure pirddaa i xoonissana gakkanaassi, dinccettida shombboquwaa menttenna; qassi cuwattiya muqaaddaakka i toissenna.

English Sentences: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihuda gidenna asai ubbai an ammanana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil, blind, and dumb: and he healed him, insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, amarida asati xalahee oiqqin duudida issi qooqe bitaniyaa Yesuusakko ehiidosona; Yesuusi he duude bitaniyaa pattidi, haasayissiisinne a aifiyaakka xeelissiisi.

English Sentences: And all the people were amazed, and said, Is not this the son of David?
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai garamettidi, "Laa hagee Daawita na7a gidanddeeshsha?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But when the Pharisees heard it, they said, This fellow doth not cast out devils, but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Parisaaweti hegaa siyidi, "Ha bitanee xalahetu halaqai Bi7eeli-Zeebuli baayyo wolqqaa immin, xalaheta kessees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus knew their thoughts, and said unto them, Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta qofaa eridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Ba giddon shaakettiya kawotetta ubbai xayana; qassi ba giddon shaakettiya katamai woi keetta asaikka eqqenna.

English Sentences: And if Satan cast out Satan, he is divided against himself; how shall then his kingdom stand?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Seexaanai Seexaanaa kessiyaabaa gidikko, ba giddon shaakettiis; yaatin, a kawotettai waanidi eqqanee?

English Sentences: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils, by whom do your children cast them out? therefore they shall be your judges.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tau Bi7eeli-Zeebuli wolqqaa immin, taani xalaheta kessiyaabaa gidikko, intte asau wolqqaa ooni immin xalaheta kessanee? Hegaa gishshau, eti intte bolli pirddana.

English Sentences: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God, then the kingdom of God is come unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossaa Geeshsha Ayyaanai tau wolqqaa immin, taani xalaheta kessiyaabaa gidikko, simmi Xoossaa kawotettai inttekko yiichchiis.

English Sentences: Or else how can one enter into a strong man's house, and spoil his goods, except he first bind the strong man? and then he will spoil his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Woi asi kasetidi, wolqqaama asa qachchennan de7iiddi, a keettaa gelidi, a miishshaa bonqqanau waanidi danddayii? Qachchidoogaappe guyyiyan, a keettaa bonqqana danddayees.

English Sentences: He that is not with me is against me; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta bagga gidenna urai tabaa ixxees; qassi tanaara issippe shiishshennaagee laalees.

English Sentences: Wherefore I say unto you, All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men: but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani intteyyo odais; Xoossai asayyo ai nagara gidinkka, qassi ai cashsha gidinkka atto gaana; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa cayidaagaayyo atto geenna.

English Sentences: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him: but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost, it shall not be forgiven him, neither in this world, neither in the world to come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta bolli, Asa Na7aa bolli, iitabaa haasayiya o nagaraanne Xoossai atto gaana; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa bolli iitabaa haasayiya o nagaraanne sa7an gidin, saluwan gidin, Xoossai atto geenna.

English Sentences: Either make the tree good, and his fruit good; or else make the tree corrupt, and his fruit corrupt: for the tree is known by his fruit.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lo77o aifiyaa demmanau lo77o mittaa dichchana bessees; iita mittaa intte dichchikko, iita aifiyaa demmana; aissi giikko, mittai erettiyoi ba aifiyo aifiyaana.

English Sentences: O generation of vipers, how can ye, being evil, speak good things? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHooshshatoo, intte iita gidiiddi, waatidi lo77obaa haasayanau danddayeetii? Aissi giikko, doonai wozana giddon kumidabaa haasayees.

English Sentences: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things: and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lo77o asi ba lo77o minjjaappe lo77obaa kessees; qassi iita asi ba iita minjjaappe iitabaa kessees.

English Sentences: But I say unto you, That every idle word that men shall speak, they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo odais; asi ba haasayido pattenna haasaya ubbau pirddaa gallassi zaaro immana.

English Sentences: For by thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ne haasayai nena xillissana; woi ne haasayai ne bolli pirddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered, saying, Master, we would see a sign from thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi issi asatinne Parisaaweti zaaridi Yesuusa, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, neeni malaata oottishin, nuuni be7anau koyoos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he answered and said unto them, An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign; and there shall no sign be given to it, but the sign of the prophet Jonas:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i zaaridi, etayyo hagaadan yaagiis; "Ha wodiyaa asai iitai, Xoossau ammanettennaagee, malaata koyees; hananabaa yootiya Yoonaasa malaataappe attin, hara malaati au imettenna.

English Sentences: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale's belly; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoonaasi gita moliyaa uluwan heezzu gallassaanne heezzu qammaa de7idoogaadan, taani, Asa Na7aikka, biitta giddon heezzu gallassaanne heezzu qammaa de7ana.

English Sentences: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: because they repented at the preaching of Jonas; and, behold, a greater than Jonas is here.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nanawe asai Yoonaasi yootidoogan bantta nagaraappe simmido gishshau, pirddaa gallassi denddidi, inttena mootana; be7ite, Yoonaasappe aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees.

English Sentences: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and, behold, a greater than Solomon is here.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tohossa bagga biittaa kawiyaa Solomona aadhdhida eratettaa siyanau sa7aa gaxaappe yiido gishshau, pirddaa gallassi denddada, inttena mootana; be7ite, Solomonappekka aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees.

English Sentences: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man, he walketh through dry places, seeking rest, and findeth none.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tuna ayyaanai asaappe kiyido wode, baayyo shemppiyoosaa koyiiddi, haatti bainnasaara aadhdhees; shin demmenna.

English Sentences: Then he saith, I will return into my house from whence I came out; and when he is come, he findeth it empty, swept, and garnished.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, Taani aggada yiido ta keettaa simmana yaagees; simmidi yiyo wode, keettai mela de7iyaagaanne pitetti geeyidi, giigi uttidaagaa demmees.

English Sentences: Then goeth he, and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself, and they enter in and dwell there: and the last state of that man is worse than the first. Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, biidi baappe iitiya laappun hara ayyaanata ehees; he ayyaanati gelidi, hegan de7oosona. He bitaniyaa de7oi kaseegaappe guyyeegee keehi iitees. Ha wodiyaa iita asaukka qassi hegaadan hanana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: While he yet talked to the people, behold, his mother and his brethren stood without, desiring to speak with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi daro asaayyo haasayishin, a aayyiyaanne a ishantti aara haasayanau koyidi, karen eqqidosona.

English Sentences: Then one said unto him, Behold, thy mother and thy brethren stand without, desiring to speak with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issoi a, "Ne aayyiyaanne ne ishantti nenaara haasayanau koyidi, karen eqqidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But he answered and said unto him that told him, Who is my mother? and who are my brethren?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Ta aayyiyaa oonee? Ta ishantti oonee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples, and said, Behold my mother and my brethren!
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba kushiyan ba erissiyo ashkkaratukko malaatidi, "Be7ite, ta aayyiyaanne ta ishantti hageetihona.

English Sentences: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven, the same is my brother, and sister, and mother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, saluwan de7iya ta Aawai koyiyoobaa oottiya ubbai, ta isha ta michchonne ta aayo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The same day went Jesus out of the house, and sat by the sea side.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he gallassi sooppe kiyidi, abbaa lanqqiyan uttiis.

English Sentences: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him, so that he went into a ship, and sat; and the whole multitude stood on the shore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Keehi daro asai ba lanqqiyan yuuyi aadhdhidi shiiqettin, wolwoluwaa giddo gelidi uttiis; asai ubbai abbaa lanqqiyan eqqiis.

English Sentences: And he spake many things unto them in parables, saying, Behold, a sower went forth to sow;
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaassi leemisuwan darobaa hagaadan yaagidi yootiis; "Issi bitanee zerettaa zeranau kiyiis.

English Sentences: And when he sowed, some seeds fell by the way side, and the fowls came and devoured them up:
Wolaitta Sentences: I zerishin, issi issi zerettai ogiyaa doonan wodhdhiis; wodhdhidaagaa kafoi yiidi miis.

English Sentences: Some fell upon stony places, where they had not much earth: and forthwith they sprung up, because they had no deepness of earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi issi issi zerettai guutta biittai de7iyo shuchchaa anccuwaa bolli wodhdhiis; daro biittai bainna gishshau, he zerettai sohuwaara mokkiis.

English Sentences: And when the sun was up, they were scorched; and because they had no root, they withered away.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin awai kiyido wode carshshai shulliis; adussa xaphuwaa yeddibeenna gishshau meli bayiis.

English Sentences: And some fell among thorns; and the thorns sprung up, and choked them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi zerettai aguntta giddon wodhdhiis; wodhdhidi mokkidaagaa agunttai diccidi cuulliis.

English Sentences: But other fell into good ground, and brought forth fruit, some an hundredfold, some sixtyfold, some thirtyfold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi zerettai aradda biittan wodhdhidi mokkiis; issoi xeetu aifiyaa, issoi usuppun tammaa, issoi hasttamaa aifiis.

English Sentences: Who hath ears to hear, let him hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyiyo haitti de7iyo urai siyo!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the disciples came, and said unto him, Why speakest thou unto them in parables?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko shiiqidi, "Neeni aissi etassi leemisuwan odai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He answered and said unto them, Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven, but to them it is not given.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, etassi hagaadan yaagiis; "Inttessi saluwaa kawotettaa xuuraa erai imettiis; shin etassi imettibeenna.

English Sentences: For whosoever hath, to him shall be given, and he shall have more abundance: but whosoever hath not, from him shall be taken away even that he hath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, de7iyoogau gujettana; au darana; shin bainnaagaappe harai atto, he de7iyaageekka ekettiichchana.

English Sentences: Therefore speak I to them in parables: because they seeing see not; and hearing they hear not, neither do they understand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eti xeelliiddi demmenna gishshaunne siyiiddikka siyenna gishshau, woi qassi eti akeekenna gishshaunne etau leemisuwan odais.

English Sentences: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias, which saith, By hearing ye shall hear, and shall not understand; and seeing ye shall see, and shall not perceive:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Isiyaasi etabaa hananabaa yootidoogee polettees; hananabaa yootidoogee hagaa; Intte sissaa siyana; shin intteyyo gelenna; intte xeeluwaa xeellana; shin be7ekketa.

English Sentences: For this people's heart is waxed gross, and their ears are dull of hearing, and their eyes they have closed; lest at any time they should see with their eyes and hear with their ears, and should understand with their heart, and should be converted, and I should heal them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ha asaa wozanai dammiis; bantta haittaa tulissidosona; bantta aifiyaakka qilimmidosona. Hegee bainnaakko, eti bantta aifiyan be7ana; bantta haittan siyana; bantta wozanankka akeekana; eti taakko, Xoossaakko simmana; taanikka eta pattana, shin attiis yaagees.

English Sentences: But blessed are your eyes, for they see: and your ears, for they hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin intte aifee xeelliyo gishshaunne intte haittaikka siyiyo gishshau, intte anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: For verily I say unto you, That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see, and have not seen them; and to hear those things which ye hear, and have not heard them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; hananabaa yootiya darotinne xilloti intte be7iyoogaa be7anau amottidosona; shin be7ibookkona. Intte siyiyoogaa siyanau amottidosona; shin siyibookkona.

English Sentences: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi kattaa zeriyaagaa leemisuwaa birshshettai giyoogaa siyite.

English Sentences: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom, and understandeth it not, then cometh the wicked one, and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart. This is he which received seed by the way side.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettaa qaalaa siyidi, akeekenna ooninne ogiyaa doonan wodhdhida zerettaa mala; xalahe halaqai yiidi, eta wozanan zerettidaagaa maxirggees.

English Sentences: But he that received the seed into stony places, the same is he that heareth the word, and anon with joy receiveth it;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHuchchaa anccoi de7iyo biittan wodhdhida zerettai qaalaa siyidi, sohuwaara ufaissan ekkiyaageeta milatees.

English Sentences: Yet hath he not root in himself, but dureth for a while: for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word, by and by he is offended.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hegee ha77issau de7iyoogaappe attin, aani xaphoi baawa; qaalaa gaasuwan waayee woi yedetai yiyo wode, sohuwaara xubetti aggees.

English Sentences: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word; and the care of this world, and the deceitfulness of riches, choke the word, and he becometh unfruitful.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi aguntta giddon wodhdhidaagee qaalaa siyiyaagaa milatees; shin ha sa7aa de7uwau hirggiyoogeenne duretetta siiqiyoogee qaalaa cuullees; cuullin he zerettai aifennan atti aggees.

English Sentences: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word, and understandeth it; which also beareth fruit, and bringeth forth, some an hundredfold, some sixty, some thirty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aradda biittan zerettidaagee qaalaa siyidi, akeekiya asa milatees; yaatidi aifees; issoi xeetaa, issoi usuppun tammaa issoi hasttamaa aifees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Another parable put he forth unto them, saying, The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etayyo hara leemisuwaa hagaadan yaagidi odiis; "Saluwaa kawotettai ba goshshan lo77o zerettaa zerida bitaniyaa milatees.

English Sentences: But while men slept, his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat, and went his way.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qammi asai xiskkiichchidaashin, a morkkee yiidi, gisttiyaa zeridoogaa bolli zardduwaa zeridi biis.

English Sentences: But when the blade was sprung up, and brought forth fruit, then appeared the tares also.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin gisttee mokkidi, aifido wode, zarddoikka a giddon beettiis.

English Sentences: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him, Sir, didst not thou sow good seed in thy field? from whence then hath it tares?
Wolaitta Sentences: "A ashkkarati akko yiidi, Godau, neeni ne goshshan lo77o zerettaa zerabeikkii? Yaatin, zarddoi auppe yiidee? yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He said unto them, An enemy hath done this. The servants said unto him, Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaagin Godai, Hegaa morkkee oottiis yaagiis. "Ashkkarati, Nuuni biidi shoddanaagaa dosai? yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he said, Nay; lest while ye gather up the tares, ye root up also the wheat with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin i, CHii, zardduwaa intte shoddiiddi, gisttiyaara shoddana.

English Sentences: Let both grow together until the harvest: and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers, Gather ye together first the tares, and bind them in bundles to burn them: but gather the wheat into my barn.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bochchoppite; cakkiyo wodee gakkanaashin, issippe diccona. Cakkiyo wodee gakkin, taani cakkiyaageeta, kasetidi zardduwaa maxite; maxidi taman xuugganau mirqqiyan mirqqiyan qachchite; shin gisttiyaa ta gootaran qolite gaana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Another parable put he forth unto them, saying, The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed, which a man took, and sowed in his field:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etayyo hara leemisuwaa yaagidi odiis; "Saluwaa kawotettai sanaafici giyo qii mittee aifiyo milatees; he mittee aifiyo asi ekkidi, ba goshshan zeriis.

English Sentences: Which indeed is the least of all seeds: but when it is grown, it is the greatest among herbs, and becometh a tree, so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: He zerettiyaa zeretta ubbaappe guuxxausu; shin diccido wode, hara ataakiltte ubbaappe gitatausu; kafoi yiidi, i tashiyan keexxiyoogaa keena gita mitta gidausu" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Another parable spake he unto them; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven, which a woman took, and hid in three measures of meal, till the whole was leavened.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yesuusi hara leemisuwaa etau yaagidi odiis; "Saluwaa kawotettai issi mishiriyaa heezzu kere xiilliyaa ekkada, munaqqido munaqai ubbai denddana gakkanaassi, aani tigido irshshuwaa milatees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables; and without a parable spake he not unto them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asau he ubbaa leemisuwan odiis; leemisoi bainnan i issibaakka odenna; hananabaa yootiyaagee, "Taani etayyo haasayiyo wode leemisuwan haasayais.

English Sentences: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet, saying, I will open my mouth in parables; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai merettoosappe doommidi geemmida yohota odais" giidoogee polettana mala, hegaa i odiis.

English Sentences: Then Jesus sent the multitude away, and went into the house: and his disciples came unto him, saying, Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi asaa yeggi bayidi, soo geliis; erissiyo ashkkarati akko biidi, "Goshshan de7iya zardduwaa leemisuwaa birshshettaa nuuyyo oda" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He answered and said unto them, He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Lo77o zerettaa zeriyaagee tana Asa Na7aa.

English Sentences: The field is the world; the good seed are the children of the kingdom; but the tares are the children of the wicked one;
Wolaitta Sentences: Goshshai sa7aa; lo77o zerettai kawotettaa asaa; zarddoi xalahe halaqaa asaa.

English Sentences: The enemy that sowed them is the devil; the harvest is the end of the world; and the reapers are the angels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zardduwaa zerida morkkee xalahe halaqaa; cakkiyo wodee, wodiyaa wurssettaa; qassi cakkiyaageeti kiitanchchata.

English Sentences: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire; so shall it be in the end of this world.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, zardduwaa maxidi, taman xuuggiyoogaadan, wodiyaa wurssettan hegaa mala gidana.

English Sentences: The Son of man shall send forth his angels, and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend, and them which do iniquity;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, Asa Na7ai, ta kiitanchchata kiittana; eti ta kawotettaa giddon xube gidiya ubbaanne iitabaa oottiyaageeta shiishshana.

English Sentences: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire: there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiishshidi to77enna taman olana; hegan eti yeekkana; qassi achchaa garccana.

English Sentences: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father. Who hath ears to hear, let him hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode xilloti bantta aawaa kawotettan awa aifiyaadan poo7ana. Siyiya haitti de7iyo urai siyo!

English Sentences: Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field; the which when a man hath found, he hideth, and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath, and buyeth that field.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Saluwaa kawotettai goshshan moogido miishsha milatees; issi bitanee he miishshaa demmidi, zaarettidi moogiis; daro ufaittiiddi biidi, baayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa baizzidi, he goshshaa shammiis.

English Sentences: Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man, seeking goodly pearls:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi saluwaa kawotettai inqquwaa giyo daro al77o shuchchaa koyiya zal77anchchaa milatees.

English Sentences: Who, when he had found one pearl of great price, went and sold all that he had, and bought it.
Wolaitta Sentences: He zal77anchchai daro al77o inqquwaa demmidi, biidi baayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa baizzidi, a shammiis.

English Sentences: Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net, that was cast into the sea, and gathered of every kind:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi saluwaa kawotettai ubba qommo moliyaa oiqqiya abban yeggido gitiyaa milatees.

English Sentences: Which, when it was full, they drew to shore, and sat down, and gathered the good into vessels, but cast the bad away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Molee gitiyaa kumido wode, moliyaa oiqqiya asati abbaappe gaxaa kessidi uttidosona; uttidi lo77o moliyaa qoridi, keeshiyan yeggidosona; shin iita moliyaa wora olidosona.

English Sentences: So shall it be at the end of the world: the angels shall come forth, and sever the wicked from among the just,
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodiyaa wurssettan hegaadan hanana; kiitanchchati yiidi, nagaranchchata xillotu giddoppe qoridi,

English Sentences: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire: there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: to77enna taman olana; hegan eti yeekkana; qassi achchaa garccana.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto them, Have ye understood all these things? They say unto him, Yea, Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagee ubbai intteyyo gelidee?" yaagidi eta oichchiis. Eti, "Ee" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then said he unto them, Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin i, "Hegaa gishshau, saluwaa kawotettan erissiyo ashkkara gidida higgiyaa tamaarissiya ubbai, ba minjjidosaappe ooratta miishshaanne gal77a miishshaa kessiya asa milatees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that when Jesus had finished these parables, he departed thence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ha leemisota yootidi wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan, hegaappe denddidi,

English Sentences: And when he was come into his own country, he taught them in their synagogue, insomuch that they were astonished, and said, Whence hath this man this wisdom, and these mighty works?
Wolaitta Sentences: ba yelettido katamaa biis. Biidi Aihuda woosa keettan tamaarissiyoogaa siyida asai garamettidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Hagee ha aadhdhida eratettaanne Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottanau wolqqaa awappe ekkidee?

English Sentences: Is not this the carpenter's son? is not his mother called Mary? and his brethren, James, and Joses, and Simon, and Judas?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee anaaxiyaa na7aa gidennee? A aayyiyaa Mairaamo gidekkee? A ishantti Yaaqoobanne Yooseefa, Simoonanne Yihudaa gidokkonaayye?

English Sentences: And his sisters, are they not all with us? Whence then hath this man all these things?
Wolaitta Sentences: A michchentti ubbai nunaara de7okkonaayye? Yaatin, i hagaa ubbaa awappe demmidee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they were offended in him. But Jesus said unto them, A prophet is not without honour, save in his own country, and in his own house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti i giyoobaa ekkennan ixxidosona. SHin Yesuusi he asaassi, "Hananabaa yootiyaagee ba biittaaninne bantta so asaani bonchchettennaagaappe attin, hara ubbasan bonchchettees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ammanibeenna gishshau, Xoossai oottiyo malaataa he sohuwan keehi oottibeenna.

English Sentences: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode oiddantto biittaa haariya Heeroodisi Yesuusabaa siyiis;

English Sentences: And said unto his servants, This is John the Baptist; he is risen from the dead; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: siyidi ba ashkkaratussi, "Hagee haiquwaappe denddida Xammaqiya Yohaannisa; Xoossai oottiyo wolqqaama malaataa i oottiyoogee hegaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For Herod had laid hold on John, and bound him, and put him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Heeroodisi ba ishaa Piliphphoosa machchee Heeroodiyaadi gaasotan Yohaannisa oitti qashissidi, qasho keettan yeggi wottiis.

English Sentences: For John said unto him, It is not lawful for thee to have her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Yohaannisi Heeroodisa, "Neeni Heeroodiyaado ekkanau bessenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he would have put him to death, he feared the multitude, because they counted him as a prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisi Yohaannisa woranau koyiis; shin Yihudaa asai hananabaa yootiya asadan Yohaannisa xeellido gishshau yayyiis.

English Sentences: But when Herod's birthday was kept, the daughter of Herodias danced before them, and pleased Herod.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Heeroodisi yelettido gallassai gakkin, Heeroodiyaadi na7iyaa asaa sinttan durada Heeroodisa ufaissaasu;

English Sentences: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask.
Wolaitta Sentences: ufaissin Heeroodisi na7iyo, "Nena lo77idabaa aibanne gidikko, tana oichcha; taani neessi immana" yaagidi iyyo caaqqiis.

English Sentences: And she, being before instructed of her mother, said, Give me here John Baptist's head in a charger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7iyaa ba aayee zoriyaa ekkada Heeroodisa, "Xammaqiya Yohaannisa huuphiyaa ha soruwan wottada tau imma" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the king was sorry: nevertheless for the oath's sake, and them which sat with him at meat, he commanded it to be given her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi au qarettiis; shin ba caaquwaa gishshaunne banaara uttida imattaa gishshau, iyyo immana mala azaziis.

English Sentences: And he sent, and beheaded John in the prison.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi kiittidi, Yohaannisa qooriyaa qasho keettan muucissiis.

English Sentences: And his head was brought in a charger, and given to the damsel: and she brought it to her mother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huuphiyaa soruwan wotti ehiidi, na7eessi immidosona; na7iyaa he huuphiyaa ba aayeekko efaasu.

English Sentences: And his disciples came, and took up the body, and buried it, and went and told Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati yiidi, a ahaa efiidi moogidosona; moogidi Yesuusau biidi odidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus heard of it, he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart: and when the people had heard thereof, they followed him on foot out of the cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa siyidi, wolwoluwan gelidi, he sohuwaappe barkka asi bainnasaa biis; asai hegaa siyidi, katamaappe denddidi, tohuwan a kaalliis.

English Sentences: And Jesus went forth, and saw a great multitude, and was moved with compassion toward them, and he healed their sick.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi wolwoluwaappe kiyido wode, daro asaa be7idi, he asau qarettiis; yaatidi etaara de7iya hargganchchata pattiis.

English Sentences: And when it was evening, his disciples came to him, saying, This is a desert place, and the time is now past; send the multitude away, that they may go into the villages, and buy themselves victuals.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omariyo wode, Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko yiidi, "Hagee sohoi asi bainna soho; ha77i sa7aikka qammiichchiis; asai ubbai qeeri katamata biidi, bau qumaa shammana mala, asaa yedda" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Jesus said unto them, They need not depart; give ye them to eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta, "Asai baanau koshshenna; asau miyoobaa intte immite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they say unto him, We have here but five loaves, and two fishes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaaridi a, "Nuuyyo hagan ichchashu oittappenne naa77u moleppe attin, hari baawa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He said, Bring them hither to me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta, "Hegeeta tau haa ekki ehiite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass, and took the five loaves, and the two fishes, and looking up to heaven, he blessed, and brake, and gave the loaves to his disciples, and the disciples to the multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai maatan uttana mala, Yesuusi azaziis; ichchashu oittaanne naa77u moliyaa oiqqidi, saluwaa pude xeellidi, Xoossaa galatiis; he oittaa menttidi, ba erissiyo ashkkaratussi immin, eti daro asaayyo gishidosona.

English Sentences: And they did all eat, and were filled: and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai miidi kalliis; kallin attida xarzzai tammanne naa77u samppaa kumidaagaa denttidosona.

English Sentences: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men, beside women and children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miida asai maccaasaanne naata paidennan, ichchashu sha7aa gidiyaagaa keena.

English Sentences: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship, and to go before him unto the other side, while he sent the multitudes away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi daro asaa yeddiiddi, ba erissiyo ashkkarati wolwoluwan gelidi, baappe sinttatidi, abbaappe hefintti pinnana mala azaziis.

English Sentences: And when he had sent the multitudes away, he went up into a mountain apart to pray: and when the evening was come, he was there alone.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa yeddidi, Xoossaa woossanau deriyaa huuphiyaa barkka kiyiis; sa7ai qammiichchinkka hegan barkka de7ees.

English Sentences: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea, tossed with waves: for the wind was contrary.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin wolwoloi he wode abbaa bollan de7ishin, sintta baggaara carkkoi carkkiyo gishshau, beetai wolwoluwaa sugees.

English Sentences: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them, walking on the sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baira kuttoi waassi simmin, Yesuusi abbaa bolli hemettiiddi, etakko yiis.

English Sentences: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea, they were troubled, saying, It is a spirit; and they cried out for fear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati abbaa bolli i hemettishin be7idi dagammidi, "Hegee moitille gidennee!" yaagidi yayyidi waassidosona.

English Sentences: But straightway Jesus spake unto them, saying, Be of good cheer; it is I; be not afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi sohuwaara eta, "Aikko baawa; tanattennee; yayyoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Peter answered him and said, Lord, if it be thou, bid me come unto thee on the water.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi zaaridi a, "Ta Godau, hegee nena gidikko, taani haattaa bollaara neekko baana mala, tana azazarkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Come. And when Peter was come down out of the ship, he walked on the water, to go to Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi PHeexiroosa, "Haa ya" yaagiis. PHeexiroosi wolwoluwaappe wodhdhidi, haattaa bollaara hemettiiddi, Yesuusakko beettaa doommiis.

English Sentences: But when he saw the wind boisterous, he was afraid; and beginning to sink, he cried, saying, Lord, save me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin wolqqaama carkkuwaa be7idi yayyiis; haattai bana mituwaa doommido wode, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Ta Godau tana ashsharkkii!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand, and caught him, and said unto him, O thou of little faith, wherefore didst thou doubt?
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara Yesuusi ba kushiyaa yeddidi, PHeexiroosa oiqqidi, "Laa ha ammanoi laafidoogoo! Aissi siradii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they were come into the ship, the wind ceased.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti naa77ai wolwoluwan gelido wode, carkkoi woppu giis.

English Sentences: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him, saying, Of a truth thou art the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wolwoluwaa giddon de7iya erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa, "Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gididoogee tuma" yaagidi au goinnidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were gone over, they came into the land of Gennesaret.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti abbaa pinnidi, Genssereexa giyo biittaa gakkidosona.

English Sentences: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him, they sent out into all that country round about, and brought unto him all that were diseased;
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittaa asai Yesuusa eriis; eridi hegaa heera biitta ubbaa kiittidi, harggiya asa ubbaa akko ehiis.

English Sentences: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment: and as many as touched were made perfectly whole.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harggiya asai a afalaa macara xalaalaa bochchana mala, a woossiis; macaraa bochchida ubbaikka paxiis.

English Sentences: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees, which were of Jerusalem, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi issi asatinne Parisaaweti Yerusalaameppe Yesuusakko yiidi,

English Sentences: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni erissiyo ashkkarati aissi nu aawatu wogaa mooriyoonaa? Aissi giikko, eti qumaa maanaappe kasetidi, bantta kushiyaa meecettokkona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he answered and said unto them, Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Intte intte wogaa gishshau, Xoossaa azazuwaa poliyoogaa aissi ixxeetii?

English Sentences: For God commanded, saying, Honour thy father and mother: and, He that curseth father or mother, let him die the death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko Xoossai, Ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha qassi, Ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo cayiyaagee haiqqo yaagiis.

English Sentences: But ye say, Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother, It is a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte, Issi asi ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo maaddiyoobi bau de7in, "Hegee Xoossaabaa" giikko, ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo bonchchanau bessenna yaageeta;

English Sentences: And honour not his father or his mother, he shall be free. Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition.
Wolaitta Sentences: yaatidi intte intte wogaa polanau Xoossaa qaalaa xaissideta.

English Sentences: Ye hypocrites, well did Esaias prophesy of you, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha lo77o milatiya iita asatoo, Isiyaasi balennan inttebau hananabaa yootiiddi,

English Sentences: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth, and honoureth me with their lips; but their heart is far from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hagaadan yaagiis; "Hagee asai tana ba bolla doonan bonchchees; shin eta wozanai taappe haahuwan de7ees.

English Sentences: But in vain they do worship me, teaching for doctrines the commandments of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai tau mela goinnees; aissi giikko, asi oottido azazuwaa Xoossaa higgiyaa milatissidi tamaarissees" giis yaagiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he called the multitude, and said unto them, Hear, and understand:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi daro asaa baakko xeesidi, "Siyitenne akeekite;

English Sentences: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man; but that which cometh out of the mouth, this defileth a man.
Wolaitta Sentences: asa tunissiyaabai doona giddo geliyaabaa gidenna; shin asa tunissiyaabai doonappe kiyiyaabaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then came his disciples, and said unto him, Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended, after they heard this saying?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, erissiyo ashkkarati akko yiidi, "Parisaaweti neeni haasayidoogaa siyidi, hanqqettidoogaa akeekai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he answered and said, Every plant, which my heavenly Father hath not planted, shall be rooted up.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Saluwan de7iya ta Aawai tokkibeenna mitta ubbai shodettana.

English Sentences: Let them alone: they be blind leaders of the blind. And if the blind lead the blind, both shall fall into the ditch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etabau hirggoppite; eti qooqe kaalettiya qooqeta; qooqee qooqe kaalettikko, naa77aikka ollan kunddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then answered Peter and said unto him, Declare unto us this parable.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHeexiroosi zaaridi, "Ha leemisuwaa birshshettaa nuuyyo odarkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said, Are ye also yet without understanding?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Intteyyo qassi ha77i gakkanaashinkka gelibeennee?

English Sentences: Do not ye yet understand, that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly, and is cast out into the draught?
Wolaitta Sentences: Doonan geliya ubbai ulo giddo biidi, qassi uloppe gaxi kiyiyoogaa erekketii?

English Sentences: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart; and they defile the man.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin doonappe kiyiyaabai wozanappe kiyees; asa tunissiyaabai hegaa malaa.

English Sentences: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts, murders, adulteries, fornications, thefts, false witness, blasphemies:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, wozana giddoppe iita qofai, woriyoogee, shaaramuxiyoogee, qassi shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyoogee ubbai, wuuqqiyoogee, wordduwaa markkattiyoogee, cashshai kiyees.

English Sentences: These are the things which defile a man: but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa milatiyaabai asa tunissiyoogaappe attin, meeccibeenna kushen miyoogee asa tunissenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Jesus went thence, and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi hegaappe aggidi, Xiiroosanne Sidoona giyo katamati de7iyo biitti biis.

English Sentences: And, behold, a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts, and cried unto him, saying, Have mercy on me, O Lord, thou son of David; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kanaane giyo biittaa maccaasa issinniyaa hegaappe Yesuusakko yaada, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottada, "Ta Godau, Daawita na7au, tana maararkkii; ta na7iyo xalahee pala ohetta oiqqiis" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: But he answered her not a word. And his disciples came and besought him, saying, Send her away; for she crieth after us.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi iyyo qaalanne qaattibeenna; erissiyo ashkkarati akko yiidi, "Ha mishiriyaa nu geeduwaa kaalla kaallada, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottada yootausu; hegaa gishshau, neeni o yeddarkkii" yaagidi woossidosona.

English Sentences: But he answered and said, I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani bayida dorssau, Israa7eela asaa xalaalau kiitettaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then came she and worshipped him, saying, Lord, help me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin a yaada, "Ta Godau, tana maaddarkkii!" yaagada au goinnaasu.

English Sentences: But he answered and said, It is not meet to take the children's bread, and to cast it to dogs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi i zaaridi, "Naatu qumaa ekkidi, zairotuyyo oliyoogee lo77o gidenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And she said, Truth, Lord: yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters' table.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishiriyaa, "Ee ta Godau, hegee tuma; shin harai atto zairotikka bantta godati miishin, masoofiyaappe laalettida suuppaa moosonattennee" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Then Jesus answered and said unto her, O woman, great is thy faith: be it unto thee even as thou wilt. And her daughter was made whole from that very hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi o, "Ha mishiree, ne ammanoi gita; neeni koyidoogaadan neeyyo hano" yaagiis. I na7iyaa sohuwaarakka paxa aggaasu.

English Sentences: And Jesus departed from thence, and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee; and went up into a mountain, and sat down there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaappe denddidi, Galiila Abbaa mati biis; qassi issi deriyaa bolli kiyidi, hegan uttiis.

English Sentences: And great multitudes came unto him, having with them those that were lame, blind, dumb, maimed, and many others, and cast them down at Jesus' feet; and he healed them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai wobbeta, qooqeta, quunatanne duudeta, qassi hara darota ekkidi, akko ehiis; ehiidi a matan wottiis. Yesuusi eta pattiis.

English Sentences: Insomuch that the multitude wondered, when they saw the dumb to speak, the maimed to be whole, the lame to walk, and the blind to see: and they glorified the God of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, asai duudeti haasayishin, quunati sitti giishin, wobbeti hemettishin, qooqeti xeellishin be7idi garamettidi, Israa7eela asaa Xoossaa galatiis.

English Sentences: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him, and said, I have compassion on the multitude, because they continue with me now three days, and have nothing to eat: and I will not send them away fasting, lest they faint in the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata baakko xeesidi, "Ha daro asai tanaara heezzu gallassi gakkanaassi gam77ido gishshau, taani ha asau qarettais; etau ha77i miyoobi baawa. Qassi eti ogiyan daafuridi kunddenna mala, quma mizennan eta mela yeddanaukka koyikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his disciples say unto him, Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness, as to fill so great a multitude?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi Yesuusa, "Nuuni ha bazzuwan hagaa keena asaa kalissiya quma auppe demmanee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus saith unto them, How many loaves have ye? And they said, Seven, and a few little fishes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yesuusi eta, "Intteyyo aappun oittai de7ii?" yaagidi oichchiis. Eti, "Laappun oittainne guutta moletuppe amaridaageeti de7oosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asaa, "Sa7an uttite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes, and gave thanks, and brake them, and gave to his disciples, and the disciples to the multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi he laappun oittaanne moliyaa oiqqidi, Xoossaa galatiis; menttidi erissiyo ashkkaratussi immiis; qassi erissiyo ashkkarati daro asaassi immidosona.

English Sentences: And they did all eat, and were filled: and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai miidi kalliis; miishin attida laappun samppaa kumida xarzzaa erissiyo ashkkarati denttidosona.

English Sentences: And they that did eat were four thousand men, beside women and children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miida asai maccaasaanne naata paidennan, oiddu sha7u attumaasa.

English Sentences: And he sent away the multitude, and took ship, and came into the coasts of Magdala.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asaa yeddidoogaappe guyyiyan, wolwoluwan gelidi, Magedoona giyo biitti biis.

English Sentences: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came, and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi Parisaawetinne Saaduqaaweti Yesuusakko yiidi, a paaccanau koyidosona; yaatidi banttana saluwaappe malaata bessana mala woossidosona.

English Sentences: He answered and said unto them, When it is evening, ye say, It will be fair weather: for the sky is red.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Sa7ai qammiyo wode intte, Saloi zo77ido gishshau, sa7ai booqallana yaageeta;

English Sentences: And in the morning, It will be foul weather to day: for the sky is red and lowring. O ye hypocrites, ye can discern the face of the sky; but can ye not discern the signs of the times?
Wolaitta Sentences: wonttimaatti qassi, Saloi zo77idi gubbanido gishshau, hachchi irai bukkana yaageeta; saluwaa xeellidi, sa7ai hananabaa eranau danddayeeta; shin ha wodiyaa malaataa shaakki eranau danddayekketii?

English Sentences: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign; and there shall no sign be given unto it, but the sign of the prophet Jonas. And he left them, and departed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha wodiyaa asai iitai, Xoossau ammanettennaagee, malaata koyees; hananabaa yootiya Yoonaasa malaataappe attin, hara malaati au imettenna" yaagiis. Yaagidi, eta yeggi bayidi biis.

English Sentences: And when his disciples were come to the other side, they had forgotten to take bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati abbaa pinnido wode, qumaa efaanaagaa dogidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jesus said unto them, Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Parisaawetu irshshuwaappenne Saaduqaawetu irshshuwaappe inttena eridi naagettite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they reasoned among themselves, saying, It is because we have taken no bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta giddon, "I hagaa giyoogee nuuni qumaa ehibeenna gishshaassa" yaagidi haasayaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: Which when Jesus perceived, he said unto them, O ye of little faith, why reason ye among yourselves, because ye have brought no bread?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti giyoogaa Yesuusi eridi, "Ha ammanoi paccidoogeetoo, qumi bainna gishshau, aissi intte giddon haasayeetii?

English Sentences: Do ye not yet understand, neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand, and how many baskets ye took up?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77ikka intteyyo gelibeennee? Taani ichchashu oittaa ichchashu sha7u asaayyo battidoogaa, qassi intte aappun samppaa kunttidi denttidaakko hassayekketii?

English Sentences: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand, and how many baskets ye took up?
Wolaitta Sentences: Woi taani laappun oittaa oiddu sha7u asaayyo battidoogaa, qassi intte aappun samppaa kunttidi denttidaakko hassayekketii?

English Sentences: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread, that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena Parisaawetu irshshuwaappenne Saaduqaawetu irshshuwaappe naagettite giyoogaappe attin, oittabaa intteyyo haasayabeennaagaa intte waanidi akeekekketii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread, but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi banttau odidoogee, Parisaawetu timirttiyaappenne Saaduqaawetu timirttiyaappe eti naagettanaagaa gididoogaappe attin, oittan tigiyo irshshuwaappe naagettanaagaa gidennaagaa he wode akeekidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying, Whom do men say that I the Son of man am?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Piliphphoosi-Qiisaariyaa giyo biittaa gakkido wode, ba erissiyo ashkkarata, "Asai tana, Asa Na7aa oona gii?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And they said, Some say that thou art John the Baptist: some, Elias; and others, Jeremias, or one of the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi, "Nena issi issi asai, Xammaqiya Yohaannisa yaagees; harati qassi Eelaasa yaagoosona; qassi baggati Ermmaasa woi hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe issuwaa yaagoosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He saith unto them, But whom say ye that I am?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta, "Yaanin intte tana oona geetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Simon Peter answered and said, Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosi zaaridi, "Neeni de7o Xoossaa Na7aa Kiristtoosa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto him, Blessed art thou, Simon Barjona: for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee, but my Father which is in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Yoona na7aa Simoonaa, hagaa neessi saluwan de7iya ta Aawai erissidoogaappe attin, asi ooninne nena erissibeenna gishshau, neeni anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: And I say also unto thee, That thou art Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosaa, taani neeyyo odais; neeni shuchcha; taani ha zaallaa bolli ta woosa keettaa keexxana; ta woosa keettaa harai atto, Si7ooliyaa wolqqaikka xoonanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neessi saluwaa kawotettaa qulppiyaa immana; neeni sa7an qachchiyo ubbai saluwan qashetti uttiis; neeni sa7an birshshiyo ubbai saluwankka birshshetti uttiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Kiristtoosa i gididoogaa erissiyo ashkkarati oossinne odenna mala, eta azaziis.

English Sentences: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples, how that he must go unto Jerusalem, and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be killed, and be raised again the third day.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodeppe doommidi Yesuusi, "Taani Yerusalaame bin, tana cimati, qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti daro waissanau bessees; eti tana woranaunne taani heezzantto gallassi haiquwaappe denddanau bessees" yaagidi, ba erissiyo ashkkaratussi geeshshidi oduwaa doommiis.

English Sentences: Then Peter took him, and began to rebuke him, saying, Be it far from thee, Lord: this shall not be unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi a issi baggi zaaridi, "Ta Godau, Xoossai nena hegaappe ashsho; hagee ne bolli mulekka yeenna" yaagidi a zoranau doommiis.

English Sentences: But he turned, and said unto Peter, Get thee behind me, Satan: thou art an offence unto me: for thou savourest not the things that be of God, but those that be of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi guyye simmidi PHeexiroosa, "Ha Seexaanau, neeni ta matappe kichcha; neeni asi dosiyoobaa qoppiyoogaappe attin, Xoossai dosiyoobaa qoppenna gishshau, tau xube gidadasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata hagaadan yaagiis; "Tana kaallanau koyiya urai de7ikko, bana yeggi bayo; yaatidi ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi, tana kaallo.

English Sentences: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it: and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ba shemppuwaa ashshana koyiya urai bashshana; shin ba shemppuwaa ta gishshau bashshiya urai ashshana.

English Sentences: For what is a man profited, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul?
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi urai sa7an de7iya ubbabaa bau shiishshidi, ba shemppuwaa bashshikko, a ai maaddanee? Woi issi urai ba shemppuwaa wozanau ai immana danddayii?

English Sentences: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels; and then he shall reward every man according to his works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani, Asa Na7ai, ta Aawaa bonchchuwan ta kiitanchchatuura yaana hanais; asa ubbau he wode a oosuwaa malaa immana.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, There be some standing here, which shall not taste of death, till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; amarida asati, taani, Asa Na7ai, kawo gidada yiyoogaa be7ana gakkanaassi, haiqqennaageeti hagan de7oosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter, James, and John his brother, and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi usuppun gallassappe guyyiyan, banaara PHeexiroosa, Yaaqoobanne, Yaaqooba ishaa Yohaannisa ekkidi, eta xalaalaa gita deriyaa huuphiyaa kessiis.

English Sentences: And was transfigured before them: and his face did shine as the sun, and his raiment was white as the light.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eti xeellishin, eta sinttan laamettiis; a som77oi awa aifiyaadan poo7iis; a maayoikka poo7uwaadan booxxiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muuseenne Eelaasi Yesuusaara haasayishin, ha heezzu erissiyo ashkkarati be7idosona.

English Sentences: Then answered Peter, and said unto Jesus, Lord, it is good for us to be here: if thou wilt, let us make here three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi Yesuusa, "Ta Godau, nuuni hagan de7iyoogee nuussi lo77o; neeni dosikko, nuuni hagan heezzu zamppata issuwaa neessi, issuwaa Muusessi, issuwaa Eelaasassi zamppayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: While he yet spake, behold, a bright cloud overshadowed them: and behold a voice out of the cloud, which said, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased; hear ye him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I haasayishin, poo7iya shaarai yinne eta gentti aggiis; genttin shaaraappe, "Hagee taani siiqiyo tana ufaissiya ta Na7aa; i giyoogaa siyite" giya qaalai yiis.

English Sentences: And when the disciples heard it, they fell on their face, and were sore afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati he qaalaa siyido wode, daro yayyidi, gufanni wodhdhidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus came and touched them, and said, Arise, and be not afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etakko yiidi, eta bochchiis; bochchidi, "Denddite; yayyoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they had lifted up their eyes, they saw no man, save Jesus only.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti xoqqu giidi xeelliyo wode, Yesuusa xalaalaappe attin, hara asa oonanne be7ibookkona.

English Sentences: And as they came down from the mountain, Jesus charged them, saying, Tell the vision to no man, until the Son of man be risen again from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti deriyaappe wodhdhishin, Yesuusi eta, "Taani Asa Na7ai, haiquwaappe denddana gakkanaassi, ha intte be7idoogaa ooyyoonne odoppite" yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And his disciples asked him, saying, Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa, "Yaatin, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti aissi, Eelaasi kasetidi yaanau bessees giyoonaa?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Elias truly shall first come, and restore all things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin i zaaridi yaagiis; "Eelaasi kaseti yiidi, ubbabaa giigissana.

English Sentences: But I say unto you, That Elias is come already, and they knew him not, but have done unto him whatsoever they listed. Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them.
