Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani intteyyo odais; Eelaasi hagaappe kase yiichchiis. Yin asai a ba koyidobaa ubbaa oottidoogaappe attin eribeenna; hegaadankka, qassi tana, Asa Na7aa, asai waissana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati he wode banttau Yesuusi Xammaqiya Yohaannisabaa odiyoogaa akeekidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were come to the multitude, there came to him a certain man, kneeling down to him, and saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti daro asaakko yiido wode, issi bitanee Yesuusakko yiidi, a sinttan gulbbatidi,

English Sentences: Lord, have mercy on my son: for he is lunatick, and sore vexed: for ofttimes he falleth into the fire, and oft into the water.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta Godau, ta na7aa kaarettai oiqqin, i daro wode taman, qassi daro wode haattan kunddiyo gishshau, i keehi sahettees; a pattarkkii.

English Sentences: And I brought him to thy disciples, and they could not cure him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne erissiyo ashkkaratukkokka a ehaas; shin pattanau danddayibookkona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Jesus answered and said, O faithless and perverse generation, how long shall I be with you? how long shall I suffer you? bring him hither to me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi eta, "Ammanenna ha wodiyaa geella asau! Taani inttenaara aude gakkanaassi de7anee? Qassi inttebaa aude gakkanaassi danddayanee? Na7aa taakko haa ekki yiite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus rebuked the devil; and he departed out of him: and the child was cured from that very hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi xalahiyaa, "Appe kiya" giidi azazin, xalahee na7aappe kiyi aggiis; sohuwaarakka na7ai paxi bayiis.

English Sentences: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart, and said, Why could not we cast him out?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, erissiyo ashkkarati banttarkka Yesuusakko yiidi, "Nuuni xalahiyaa kessanau aissi danddayibookkonii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto them, Because of your unbelief: for verily I say unto you, If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed, ye shall say unto this mountain, Remove hence to yonder place; and it shall remove; and nothing shall be impossible unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta yaagiis; "Hegee intte ammanoi guuxxido gishshataassa; taani intteyyo tumaa odais; intteyyo sanaafici giyo qii mittee aifee keena ammanoi de7iyaakko, intte ha deriyaa, Hagaappe yaa shiiqa yaagiyaakko i shiiqana; intte ai oottanaukka danddayana.

English Sentences: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hagaa malaa woosappenne xoomappe harabai kessanau danddayenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And while they abode in Galilee, Jesus said unto them, The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men:
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati Galiilan, issippe shiiqi uttidaashin, Yesuusi eta, "Tana, Asa Na7aa, asi asau aattidi immana.

English Sentences: And they shall kill him, and the third day he shall be raised again. And they were exceeding sorry.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai tana worana; worin taani heezzantto gallassi haiquwaappe denddana" yaagiis. Erissiyo ashkkarati daro qarettidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were come to Capernaum, they that received tribute money came to Peter, and said, Doth not your master pay tribute?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati Qifirinaahooma katamaa yiido wode, Beeta Maqidasiyaassi giiraa ekkiyaageeti PHeexiroosakko yiidi, "Inttena tamaarissiyaagee Beeta Maqidasiyaa giiraa giirennee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He saith, Yes. And when he was come into the house, Jesus prevented him, saying, What thinkest thou, Simon? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute? of their own children, or of strangers?
Wolaitta Sentences: I zaaridi, "Giirees" yaagiis. PHeexiroosi soo gelido wode, Yesuusi kasetidi a, "Simoonaa, ne qofai aibee? Ha sa7aa kawoti qaraxaa woi giiraa ooppe ekkiyoonaa? Bantta biittaa asaappe ekkiyoonaayye woi hara biitta asaappe ekkiyoonaa?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Peter saith unto him, Of strangers. Jesus saith unto him, Then are the children free.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHeexiroosi, "Hara biitta asaappe ekkoosona" yaagiis. Yesuusi PHeexiroosa, "Yaatikko, biittaa asai giiranau bessenna.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding, lest we should offend them, go thou to the sea, and cast an hook, and take up the fish that first cometh up; and when thou hast opened his mouth, thou shalt find a piece of money: that take, and give unto them for me and thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni ha asata hanqqetissanau koyokko; neeni abbaa baada aani piriyaa yegga; yaatada koiro kiyiya moliyaa oiqqada, a doonaa pooqqiyo wode, giirau gidiya miishshaa neeni demmana. Hegaa ekkada, ta giiraanne ne giiraa etau qanxxa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus, saying, Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko he wode yiidi, "Saluwaa kawotettan ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagee oonee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus called a little child unto him, and set him in the midst of them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi issi guutta na7aa xeesidi, eta giddon essidi, hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: And said, Verily I say unto you, Except ye be converted, and become as little children, ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; Xoossaakko intte simmidi, guutta naatudan hanana xayikko, saluwaa kawotettaa mulekka gelanau danddayekketa.

English Sentences: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child, the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi ha guutta na7aadan, bana kaushshiya ooninne saluwaa kawotettan ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagaa.

English Sentences: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi hagaa mala na7a ta sunttan mokkiya ooninne tana mokkees.

English Sentences: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me, it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin tana ammaniya ha guutta naatuppe issuwaa balettiya ooninne, gaacciyo wogga woxaa ba qooriyan qachchidi, ciimma abban mitettiyoogee au keha.

English Sentences: Woe unto the world because of offences! for it must needs be that offences come; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh!
Wolaitta Sentences: "Sa7ai asaa xubbiyo gishshau, sa7aayyo aayye7ana; aissi giikko, xubbiyaabai yuussaa aggenna; shin xubee a gaasotan yiyo uraayyo aayye7ana.

English Sentences: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee, cut them off, and cast them from thee: it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed, rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne kushee woi ne tohoi nena balettikko, neeppe qanxxa ola; neeni naa77u kushiyaaranne naa77u tohuwaara merinaa taman olettanaagaappe wobbe woi duuxa kushiyaara merinaa de7uwaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha.

English Sentences: And if thine eye offend thee, pluck it out, and cast it from thee: it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye, rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ne aifee nena balettikko, neeppe wooca ola; neeni naa77u aifiyaara Gaannabiyaa taman olettanaagaappe issi aifiyaara merinaa de7uwaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha.

English Sentences: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones; for I say unto you, That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte ha guuttatuppe issuwaanne karenna mala, inttena naagite; aissi giikko, taani intteyyo odais; saluwan eta kiitanchchati ubba wode, saluwan de7iya ta Aawaa sinttan de7oosona.

English Sentences: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani, Asa Na7ai, bayidaagaa ashshanau yaas.

English Sentences: How think ye? if a man have an hundred sheep, and one of them be gone astray, doth he not leave the ninety and nine, and goeth into the mountains, and seeketh that which is gone astray?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asayyo xeetu dorssati de7iyaageetuppe issoi bayikko, uddufun tammanne uddufunaa deriyan yeggi bayidi, he bayidaagaa koyanau beennee? Intte woigeetii?

English Sentences: And if so be that he find it, verily I say unto you, he rejoiceth more of that sheep, than of the ninety and nine which went not astray.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; i demmikko, bayibeenna uddufun tammanne uddufun dorssatuppe aattidi, he issi dorssan ufaittees.

English Sentences: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven, that one of these little ones should perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, saluwan de7iya intte Aawai ha guuttatuppe issoi bayyanaagaakka koyenna.

English Sentences: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee, go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone: if he shall hear thee, thou hast gained thy brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne ishai nena naaqqikko, nerkka akko baada, a mooruwaa au yoota; i nebaa siyikko, ne ishaa balaappe zaaradasa.

English Sentences: But if he will not hear thee, then take with thee one or two more, that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i nebaa siyennan ixxikko, naa77u woi heezzu markkai markkattidoogan yoho ubbai tumattiyo gishshau, hara issi woi naa77u asa nenaara ekka efa.

English Sentences: And if he shall neglect to hear them, tell it unto the church: but if he neglect to hear the church, let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican.
Wolaitta Sentences: I etabaa siyennan ixxikko, ubbabaa woosa keettaassi oda; qassi woosa keettai giyoogaakka i siyennan ixxikko, ammanenna asadaaninne giiraa ekkiya asadan a paida.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; sa7an intte qachchiyo ubbai saluwankka qashetti uttiis; qassi sa7an intte birshshiyo ubbai saluwankka birshshetti uttiis.

English Sentences: Again I say unto you, That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassikka taani intteyyo odais; intteppe naa77u urai sa7an Xoossaa woossiyooban aibiininne maayettikko, saluwan de7iya ta Aawai hegaa intteyyo immana.

English Sentences: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, naa77u urai woi heezzu urai ta sunttan shiiqiyoosan, taani hegan eta gidduwan de7ais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then came Peter to him, and said, Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi he wode Yesuusakko yiidi, "Godau, ta ishai tana aapputoo naaqqikko taani ayyo atto gaanau bessii? Laappuntto gakkanaassi naaqqiineeyye?" yaagidi a oichchiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi a, "CHii, taani nena laappun tammutoo laappuntto gaisippe attin, laappuntto giikke.

English Sentences: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king, which would take account of his servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aissi giikko, saluwaa kawotettai ba ashkkaratuura miishshaa qoodettanau qoppida kawuwaa milatees.

English Sentences: And when he had begun to reckon, one was brought unto him, which owed him ten thousand talents.
Wolaitta Sentences: He kawoi miishshaa qoodettanau doommido wode, daro sha7u paundde acoi de7iyo issi bitaniyaa akko ehiidosona.

English Sentences: But forasmuch as he had not to pay, his lord commanded him to be sold, and his wife, and children, and all that he had, and payment to be made.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he ashkkarau acuwaa qanxxiyoobai xayin, a godai he acuwaa qanxxanau, a machchiyaanne inne a naati, qassi au de7iya ubbabai baizettana mala, a azaziis.

English Sentences: The servant therefore fell down, and worshipped him, saying, Lord, have patience with me, and I will pay thee all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, ashkkarai ba godaa sinttan gulbbatidi, Ta godau, hai nanggashsharkkii; taani neeyyo ubbabaakka qanxxana yaagidi a woossiis.

English Sentences: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion, and loosed him, and forgave him the debt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woossin a godai au qarettidi, a yeddi bayiis; a acuwaakka ayyo maari aggiis.

English Sentences: But the same servant went out, and found one of his fellowservants, which owed him an hundred pence: and he laid hands on him, and took him by the throat, saying, Pay me that thou owest.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin he ashkkarai kiyidi, ba lagge ashkkaratuppe issoi baappe ishatamu bira gidiyaagaa tal77idaagaara gaittidi, Ne bolli de7iya ta miishshaa qanxxa yaagi oiqqidi, a cuulliis.

English Sentences: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet, and besought him, saying, Have patience with me, and I will pay thee all.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Cuullin he a lagge ashkkarai a sinttan gulbbatidi, Hai nanggashsharkkii; taani neeyyo ubbabaakka qanxxana yaagidi a woossiis.

English Sentences: And he would not: but went and cast him into prison, till he should pay the debt.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin ixxidi ekki efiidi, a laggee he acuwaa qanxxana gakkanaashin, qasho keettaa gelissiis.

English Sentences: So when his fellowservants saw what was done, they were very sorry, and came and told unto their lord all that was done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, a lagge ashkkarati hegaa be7idi, daro yiillotidosona; bantta godaakko biidi, i oottido ubbabaa au odidosona.

English Sentences: Then his lord, after that he had called him, said unto him, O thou wicked servant, I forgave thee all that debt, because thou desiredst me:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, godai he ashkkaraa xeesidi, Ha iita ashkkarau, neeni tana woossido gishshau, taani he aco ubbaa neeyyo maara aggaas.

English Sentences: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant, even as I had pity on thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeyyo he acuwaa maaridoogaadan, neenikka ne lagge ashkkarau maaranau bessennee? yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his lord was wroth, and delivered him to the tormentors, till he should pay all that was due unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi a daro hanqqettidi, ba acuwaa ubbaa i qanxxana gakkanaashin, paxa kaa7ettana mala, qasho keettaa gelissiis.

English Sentences: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you, if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte huuphiyan huuphiyan intte ishau wozanappe atto gaana xayikko, he godai ba ashkkaraa oottidoogaadan, saluwan de7iya ta Aawaikka inttena hegaadan oottana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that when Jesus had finished these sayings, he departed from Galilee, and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he haasayaa wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan, Galiilappe denddidi, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefinttan de7iya Yihudaa biittaa biis.

English Sentences: And great multitudes followed him; and he healed them there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai a kaallidi biidaagaa hegan pattiis.

English Sentences: The Pharisees also came unto him, tempting him, and saying unto him, Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause?
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi Parisaaweti paaccanau Yesuusakko yiidi, "Issi asi issiban gaasottidi, ba machchiyo yeddanau nu higgee azazii?" yaagidi a oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he answered and said unto them, Have ye not read, that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female,
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Xoossai koiro eta medhdhiiddi, attumaasanne maccaasa oottiis.

English Sentences: And said, For this cause shall a man leave father and mother, and shall cleave to his wife: and they twain shall be one flesh?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Issi asi ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo aggi bayidi, ba machcheera issippe de7ees; eti naa77ai issi asa gidoosona yaagiya qaalaa nabbabibeekketii?

English Sentences: Wherefore they are no more twain, but one flesh. What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eti issi asa gidiyoogaappe attin, naa77u asa gidokkona; hegaa gishshau, Xoossai issippe gattidoogaa asi shaakkoppo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They say unto him, Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement, and to put her away?
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaaweti Yesuusa, "Yaatin, Muusee aissi issi urai ba machcheeyyo paramaa immidi yeddana mala azazidee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He saith unto them, Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives: but from the beginning it was not so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Intte intte maccaasaa yeddana mala, Muusee inttena azazidoogee, intte yootin siyennaageeta gidido gishshaassappe attin, koiro hegaa mala gidenna.

English Sentences: And I say unto you, Whosoever shall put away his wife, except it be for fornication, and shall marry another, committeth adultery: and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo odais; ba machchiyo shaaramuxennan de7ishin yeddidi, haranno ekkiya ooninne shaaramuxees; harai yeddidooro ekkiyaageekka shaaramuxees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: His disciples say unto him, If the case of the man be so with his wife, it is not good to marry.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati a, "Azina giddooninne machchi giddon de7iya wogai hegaa mala gidikko, ekkennaaninne gelennan de7iyoogee keha" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he said unto them, All men cannot receive this saying, save they to whom it is given.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta yaagiis; "Hagaa mala timirttee Xoossai immidoogeetussappe attin, asa ubbaassa gidenna;

English Sentences: For there are some eunuchs, which were so born from their mother's womb: and there are some eunuchs, which were made eunuchs of men: and there be eunuchs, which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven's sake. He that is able to receive it, let him receive it.
Wolaitta Sentences: aissi giikko, bantta aayee uluwaappe yelettiyo wodekka, attumatetti bainnan yelettidaageeti de7oosona; qassi asi qaaratidoogeetikka de7oosona; qassi saluwaa kawotettaa gishshau, banttana qaaratidaageeti de7oosona; ha timirttiyaa eranau danddayiya ooninne ero" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then were there brought unto him little children, that he should put his hands on them, and pray: and the disciples rebuked them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wode ba kushiyaa guutta naatu bolli wottidi, Xoossaa woossana mala, issi issi asai naata akko ehiis; shin erissiyo ashkkarati he asaa hanqqettidosona.

English Sentences: But Jesus said, Suffer little children, and forbid them not, to come unto me: for of such is the kingdom of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi, "Guutta naati taakko yiyoogaa diggoppite; aissi giikko, saluwaa kawotettai hageetu malaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he laid his hands on them, and departed thence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi ba kushiyaa eta bolli wottidoogaappe guyyiyan, hegaappe aggi bayidi biis.

English Sentences: And, behold, one came and said unto him, Good Master, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi bitanee Yesuusakko yiidi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, taani merinaa de7uwaa demmanau lo77obaa ai oottoo?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God: but if thou wilt enter into life, keep the commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi a, "Lo77obai aibakko tana aissi oichchai? Issuwaa xalaalai lo77o; shin neeni merinau de7anau koyikko, azazota naaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: He saith unto him, Which? Jesus said, Thou shalt do no murder, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false witness,
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee, "Augeeta?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Woroppa; shaaramuxoppa; wuuqqoppa; worddo markkattoppa;

English Sentences: Honour thy father and thy mother: and, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha; ne shooruwaakka ne huuphedan siiqa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The young man saith unto him, All these things have I kept from my youth up: what lack I yet?
Wolaitta Sentences: He yelaga bitanee Yesuusa, "Taani hegaa ubbaakka guutta naatettaasappe doommada naagaas; yaatin, tau pacciyaabi aibee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus said unto him, If thou wilt be perfect, go and sell that thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come and follow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi bitaniyaa, "Neeni polida asa gidanau koyikko, baada neeyyo de7iyaabaa baizzada, he miishshaa hiyyeesau imma; neeni saluwan duretana; yaatada yaada tana kaalla" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But when the young man heard that saying, he went away sorrowful: for he had great possessions.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he yelaga bitanee hegaa siyido wode, i daro dure gidiyo gishshau, qarettiiddi aggi bayidi biis.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily I say unto you, That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratussi, "Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; dure asi saluwaa kawotettaa gelanaagee daro meto gidana.

English Sentences: And again I say unto you, It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani gujjadakka intteyyo odais; dure asi Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanaagaappe, gaameelai marppiyaa xoo7iyaara aadhdhanaagee matattees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When his disciples heard it, they were exceedingly amazed, saying, Who then can be saved?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa siyidi garamettidi, "Yaatin, ooni attanau danddayii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta tishshi ootti xeellidi, "Hagee asau danddayettenna; shin Xoossau ubbabai danddayettees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then answered Peter and said unto him, Behold, we have forsaken all, and followed thee; what shall we have therefore?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi he wode zaaridi Yesuusa, "Be7a, nuuni nuuyyo de7iya ubbabaa aggi bayidi, nena kaallida; yaatidi nuuni ai demmaneeshsha?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto them, Verily I say unto you, That ye which have followed me, in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory, ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; taani, Asa Na7ai, ooratta biittan ta kawotaa araatan uttiyo wode, tana kaallida inttekka tammanne naa77u Israa7eela zaretu bolli pirddanau, tammanne naa77u kawotaa araatan uttana.

English Sentences: And every one that hath forsaken houses, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my name's sake, shall receive an hundredfold, and shall inherit everlasting life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta sunttaa gishshau, keettata woi ishantta woi michchentta, woi aawaa woi aayyiyo woi machchiyo, woi naata woi gadiyaa aggida ooninne, xeetu kushiyaappe dichchaa ekkana; qassi merinaa de7uwaakka laattana.

English Sentences: But many that are first shall be last; and the last shall be first.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin daroti ha77i sinttan de7iyaageeti guyye aadhdhana; qassi daroti ha77i guyyen de7iyaageeti sinttau aadhdhana.

English Sentences: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Saluwaa kawotettai woiniyaa giyo turaa gidduwaa oosanchchata keraa ootissanau, maallado guuraara kiyida woiniyaa turaa godaa milatees.

English Sentences: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day, he sent them into his vineyard.
Wolaitta Sentences: I he oosanchchatuyyo hachchi hachchi issi shilingge qanxxanau etaara giigidi, ba woiniyaa turaa gidduwaa ootissanau eta yeddiis.

English Sentences: And he went out about the third hour, and saw others standing idle in the marketplace,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi heezzu saate gidishin kiyidi, oosoi bainnan qocan eqqida hara asata be7idi,

English Sentences: And said unto them; Go ye also into the vineyard, and whatsoever is right I will give you. And they went their way.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta, Inttekka qassi ta woiniyaa turaa gidduwaa oottanau biite; taani intteyyo bessiya waagaa qanxxana yaagiis; yaagin eti biidosona.

English Sentences: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour, and did likewise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77anttuwaakka usuppun saatiyaaninne uddufun saatiyan kiyidi, hegaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: And about the eleventh hour he went out, and found others standing idle, and saith unto them, Why stand ye here all the day idle?
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne isiini saatiyan i kiyiyo wode, harati hegan eqqidaageeta demmidi, Ooso oottennan kumetta gallassaa hagan aissi eqqi pe7idetii? yaagiis.

English Sentences: They say unto him, Because no man hath hired us. He saith unto them, Go ye also into the vineyard; and whatsoever is right, that shall ye receive.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaagin eti, Nuna ootissiya asi xayido gishshau eqqi pe7ida yaagidosona. "I, Inttekka qassi ta woiniyaa turaa gidduwaa oottanau biite yaagiis.

English Sentences: So when even was come, the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward, Call the labourers, and give them their hire, beginning from the last unto the first.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Sa7ai omariyo wode, woiniyaa turaa godai oosanchchatu halaqaa, Oosanchchata xeesada, wurssettan oosuwan gelidaageetuppe doommada koiro gelidaageeta gakkanaassi, eta damoozaa qanxxa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour, they received every man a penny.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tammanne isiinintta saatiyan oosuwaa doommidaageeti yiidi, huuphiyan huuphiyan issi issi shilinggiyaa ekkidosona.

English Sentences: But when the first came, they supposed that they should have received more; and they likewise received every man a penny.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro oosuwaa doommida asati yiido wode, daruwaa ekkanau qoppidosona; shin etikka huuphiyan huuphiyan issi issi shilinggiyaa ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had received it, they murmured against the goodman of the house,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ekkidi, Ha guyyeppe yiidaageeti issi saate xalaalaa oottidosona;

English Sentences: Saying, These last have wrought but one hour, and thou hast made them equal unto us, which have borne the burden and heat of the day.
Wolaitta Sentences: kumetta gallassaa daafuraanne hombbiyaa ekkida nuugaara eta damoozaa lagge oottadasa yaagidi banttana oosuwan gelissidaagaa bolli zuuzummidosona.

English Sentences: But he answered one of them, and said, Friend, I do thee no wrong: didst not thou agree with me for a penny?
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin i etappe issuwaa hagaadan yaagiis; Ta jaalau, taani nena naaqqabeikke; issi shilinggiyan tanaara giigabeikkiiyye?

English Sentences: Take that thine is, and go thy way: I will give unto this last, even as unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neegaa ekkada ba; taani ha wurssettan oosuwan gelidaagaassikka neegaa keenaa immanau koyais.

English Sentences: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own? Is thine eye evil, because I am good?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta miishshan ta koyidobaa oottanau tau maati baawee? Woi taani keha gidido gishshau, neeni qanaatai? yaagiis.

English Sentences: So the last shall be first, and the first last: for many be called, but few chosen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaadankka, qassi guyyeegeeti sinttau aadhdhana; sinttaageeti guyye aadhdhana; aissi giikko, xeesettidaageeti daro; shin doorettidaageeti guutta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way, and said unto them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Yerusalaame biiddi, ogiyan banaara biya tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata gaxaa kessidi, dumma etassi yaagiis.

English Sentences: Behold, we go up to Jerusalem; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes, and they shall condemn him to death,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Be7ite, nuuni Yerusalaame ha77i kiyeettees. Yaani tana, Asa Na7aa qeese halaqatussinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetussi aattidi immana; eti ta bolli haiqo pirddaa pirddana.

English Sentences: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock, and to scourge, and to crucify him: and the third day he shall rise again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Aihuda gidenna asaassikka tana aattidi immana; he Aihuda gidenna asai ta bolli qilliiccananne tana lissuwan garafana; yaatidi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi, tana kaqqana; kaqqin taani heezzantto gallassi haiquwaappe denddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee's children with her sons, worshipping him, and desiring a certain thing of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Zabddiyoosa naatu aayyiyaa ba naatuura Yesuusakko yaasu; yaada a sinttan gulbbatada issibaa a woossaasu.

English Sentences: And he said unto her, What wilt thou? She saith unto him, Grant that these my two sons may sit, the one on thy right hand, and the other on the left, in thy kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi o, "Ai koyai?" yaagidi oichchiis. A zaarada, "Ha ta naa77u naati ne kawotettan issoi neeppe ushachcha baggaara, qassi issoi neeppe haddirssa baggaara uttona garkkii" yaagada woossaasu.

English Sentences: But Jesus answered and said, Ye know not what ye ask. Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of, and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with? They say unto him, We are able.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi naata, "Intte ai woossiyaakko erekketa; taani uyana burccukkuwaappe uyanaunne taani xammaqettana xinqqatiyaa xammaqettanau danddayeetii?" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Ee danddayoos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he saith unto them, Ye shall drink indeed of my cup, and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with: but to sit on my right hand, and on my left, is not mine to give, but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Taani uyiyo burccukkuwaappe tumakka intte uyana; shin taappe ushachcha baggaaranne haddirssa baggaara uttanaageeta dooranau taayyo maati baawa; shin he sohoi ta Aawai immanau giigissi wottidoogeetussa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the ten heard it, they were moved with indignation against the two brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hankko tammu erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa siyido wode, he naa77u ishantta hanqqettidosona.

English Sentences: But Jesus called them unto him, and said, Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them, and they that are great exercise authority upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta ubbaa baakko xeesidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Aihuda gidennaageetu halaqatinne hegeeta kaalettiya asati bantta asaa haariyoogaa ereeta.

English Sentences: But it shall not be so among you: but whosoever will be great among you, let him be your minister;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte giddon hegaa mala gidenna; shin intte giddon gitatana koyiya ooninne intteyyo ashkkara gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: And whosoever will be chief among you, let him be your servant:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi intte giddon ubbaappe bolla gidana koyiyai ooninne intteyyo aille gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan taani, Asa Na7ai, asaayyo oottanaunne daro asaa wozanau ta shemppuwaa immanau yiidoogaappe attin, asi tau oottanau yabeikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as they departed from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati Yarkkoppe kiyishin, daro asai eta kaalliis.

English Sentences: And, behold, two blind men sitting by the way side, when they heard that Jesus passed by, cried out, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, thou son of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77u qooqe asati ogiyaa doonan uttidaageeti Yesuusi hegaara aadhdhiyoogaa siyidi, bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Godau, Daawita na7au, nuna maararkkii" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the multitude rebuked them, because they should hold their peace: but they cried the more, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, thou son of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai eta, "Haizzite" giidi hanqqettiis; shin eti bantta qaalaa keehi xoqqu oottidi, "Godau, Daawita na7au, nuna maararkkii!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus stood still, and called them, and said, What will ye that I shall do unto you?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ogiyan eqqidi, eta xeesiis; xeesidi, "Taani intteyyo ai oottanau koyeetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They say unto him, Lord, that our eyes may be opened.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qooqeti, "Godau, nu aifiyaa pattarkkii" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So Jesus had compassion on them, and touched their eyes: and immediately their eyes received sight, and they followed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etau qarettidi, eta aifiyaa bochchiis; sohuwaarakka eta aifee xeelli aggin, a kaalli bayidosona.

English Sentences: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem, and were come to Bethphage, unto the mount of Olives, then sent Jesus two disciples,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yerusalaame matidi, Dabira Zaite giyo deriyaa lanqqiyan de7iya Beetafaage giyo qeeri katamaa gakkidosona; Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77aa sinttau kiittidi,

English Sentences: Saying unto them, Go into the village over against you, and straightway ye shall find an ass tied, and a colt with her: loose them, and bring them unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Intteppe sinttan de7iya qeeri katamaa biite; biidi issi hariyaa qashuwan de7iyaaro i maraara intte sohuwaara demmana; eta birshshidi, tau ekki yiite.

English Sentences: And if any man say ought unto you, ye shall say, The Lord hath need of them; and straightway he will send them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne inttena oichchikko, Godai hageeta koyees yaagite; sohuwaarakka i eta yeddi bayana.

English Sentences: All this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiyaagee, "Xiyoone katamau,

English Sentences: Tell ye the daughter of Sion, Behold, thy King cometh unto thee, meek, and sitting upon an ass, and a colt the foal of an ass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a, ne kawoi ashkke gididi, hariyaa bolli, hare maraa bolli uttidi, neekko yees yaagite" yaagidi haasayidoogee polettana mala, hagee haniis.

English Sentences: And the disciples went, and did as Jesus commanded them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati biidi, Yesuusi banttana azazidoogaadan oottidosona.

English Sentences: And brought the ass, and the colt, and put on them their clothes, and they set him thereon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hariyoonne hare maraa ehiidi, bantta maayuwaa eta zokkuwan hiixxidosona; hiixxin Yesuusi toggiis.

English Sentences: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way; others cut down branches from the trees, and strawed them in the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: He daro asaappe dariya baggai ba maayuwaa ogiyan hiixxiis; qassi harati mittaa tashiyaa kari karidi, ogiyan hiixxidosona.

English Sentences: And the multitudes that went before, and that followed, cried, saying, Hosanna to the son of David: Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord; Hosanna in the highest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusappe sinttaara hemettiya daro asainne qassi a geeduwaa kaalliya daro asai, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Daawita na7ai galatetto! Godaa sunttan yiyaagee anjjettidaagaa! Xoossai galatetto!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he was come into Jerusalem, all the city was moved, saying, Who is this?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Yerusalaame katamaa gelido wode, kataman de7iya asai ubbai, "Hagee oonee?" yaagidi shabbirettiis.

English Sentences: And the multitude said, This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai, "Hagee Galiilan de7iya Naazireeta giyo katamaappe yiida hananabaa yootiya Yesuusa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus went into the temple of God, and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers, and the seats of them that sold doves,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi, hegan baizziyaageetanne shammiyaageeta ubbaa kare yedettiis; qassi miishshaa laammiyaageetu xaraphpheezaanne haraphphiyaa baizziyaageetu oidiyaa aatti yeggidi,

English Sentences: And said unto them, It is written, My house shall be called the house of prayer; but ye have made it a den of thieves.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta, "Xoossaa maxaafan, Ta keettai Xoossaa woossiyo keetta geetettana yaagettidi xaafetti uttiis; shin intte a panggati qosettiyo gonggolo kesseeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple; and he healed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qooqetinne tohoi silidoogeeti Yesuusakko Beeta Maqidasiyaa yin, i eta pattiis.

English Sentences: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did, and the children crying in the temple, and saying, Hosanna to the son of David; they were sore displeased,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti Yesuusi oottiyo oorattabaa be7ido wodenne, guutta naati Beeta Maqidasiyan bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Daawita na7ai galatetto" yaagiyoogaa be7ido wode hanqqettidosona.

English Sentences: And said unto him, Hearest thou what these say? And Jesus saith unto them, Yea; have ye never read, Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hanqqettidi Yesuusa, "Hageeti giyoogaa siyai?" yaagidosona. Yesuusi, "Ee siyais; Xoossaa maxaafai, Guutta naatinne xammiya naati nena galatana mala, eta erissadasa yaagiyaagaa mulekka nabbabibeekketii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he left them, and went out of the city into Bethany; and he lodged there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta aggi bayidi, he katamaappe Biitaaniyaa giyo katamaa biidi, yaani aqiis.

English Sentences: Now in the morning as he returned into the city, he hungered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi maallado katamaa simmidi yiidi namisettiis.

English Sentences: And when he saw a fig tree in the way, he came to it, and found nothing thereon, but leaves only, and said unto it, Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever. And presently the fig tree withered away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ogiyaa doonan issi balase giyo mittiyo be7idi, ikko biis; biidi he balasen haitta xalaalappe attin, aife ainne demmibeenna; o, "Naa77anttuwaa merinaukka aifoppa" yaagin, he balasiyaa sohuwaara mela aggaasu.

English Sentences: And when the disciples saw it, they marvelled, saying, How soon is the fig tree withered away!
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa be7idi garamettidi, "Ha balasiyaa waanada issi kuttan mela aggadee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto them, Verily I say unto you, If ye have faith, and doubt not, ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree, but also if ye shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; it shall be done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; intte ammanoi de7iyoogeetanne sirennaageeta gidikko, ha balasiyo taani oottidoogaa mala xalaalaa oottekketa; shin harai atto intte ha deriyaa, Denddada abban kundda giikkokka hanana;

English Sentences: And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.
Wolaitta Sentences: intte ammanidi Xoossaa woossiyoobaa aiba gidikkokka ekkana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he was come into the temple, the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching, and said, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaa yiidi tamaarissishin, qeese halaqatinne Aihuda cimati akko yiidi, "Neeni hagaa oottanau neeyyo ai alaafetetti de7ii? Neeyyo ha alaafetettaa oonee immidai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto them, I also will ask you one thing, which if ye tell me, I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi eta, "Taanikka inttena issibaa oichchana; intte tau hegaa odikko, taani hagaa ai alaafetettan oottiyaakko, intteyyo odana;

English Sentences: The baptism of John, whence was it? from heaven, or of men? And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say unto us, Why did ye not then believe him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi xammaqiyo alaafetettai awappe yiidee? Xoossaappe yiideeyye asappe yiidee?" yaagiis. Eti bantta giddon palamaa doommidi, "Nuuni, Xoossaappe yiis yaagikko i nuna, Yaatin, Yohaannisi yootidoogaa aissi ammanibeekketii? yaagana.

English Sentences: But if we shall say, Of men; we fear the people; for all hold John as a prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni, Asappe yiis yaagikko, asai ubbai Yohaannisi hananabaa yootiyaagaa gididoogaa eriyo gishshau, asau yayyoos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they answered Jesus, and said, We cannot tell. And he said unto them, Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yesuusayyo, "Nuuni erokko" yaagidi zaaridosona. Yesuusi, "Taanikka hagaa ai alaafetettan oottiyaakko, intteyyo odikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But what think ye? A certain man had two sons; and he came to the first, and said, Son, go work to day in my vineyard.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin intte ai qoppeetii? Naa77u naati de7iyo issi bitanee de7ees; he bitanee baira na7aakko biidi, Ta na7au, hachchi baada ta woiniyaa turaa ootta yaagiis.

English Sentences: He answered and said, I will not: but afterward he repented, and went.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7ai zaaridi, Ixxaas giis; shin guyyeppe ba wozanan qoppi ekkidi, woiniyaa turaa oottanau biis.

English Sentences: And he came to the second, and said likewise. And he answered and said, I go, sir: and went not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawai hinkko na7aakko biidi, bairau giidoogaadankka au giis; kaalo na7ai zaaridi, Ero ta godau yaagiis; shin bibeenna.

English Sentences: Whether of them twain did the will of his father? They say unto him, The first. Jesus saith unto them, Verily I say unto you, That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha naa77u naatuppe ba aawai koyidoogaa oottidaagee augee?" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Bairaa" yaagidosona. Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; giiraa ekkiyaageetinne shaaramuxati intteppe sinttatidi, Xoossaa kawotettaa gelana.

English Sentences: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness, and ye believed him not: but the publicans and the harlots believed him: and ye, when ye had seen it, repented not afterward, that ye might believe him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xammaqiya Yohaannisi xillotettaa ogiyaa tamaarissiiddi, inttekko yin, i giyoogaa ammanibeekketa. SHin giiraa ekkiyaageetinne shaaramuxati i giyoogaa ammanidosona; intte harai atto hegaa be7idikka, intte nagaraappe simmidi, i giyoogaa ammanibeekketa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Hear another parable: There was a certain householder, which planted a vineyard, and hedged it round about, and digged a winepress in it, and built a tower, and let it out to husbandmen, and went into a far country:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yesuusi hagaadan yaagiis; "Hara leemisuwaakka siyite; woiniyaa giyo turaa tokkida issi bitanee de7ees; woiniyaa turaa yuushshi aattidi diriis; qassi he woiniyaa gum77iyo ollaakka bookkiis; hegaa naagiya asaayyo adussa shuchchaa gimbbiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, kottaa oottiya asau immidi, hara dere biis.

English Sentences: And when the time of the fruit drew near, he sent his servants to the husbandmen, that they might receive the fruits of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa aifiyaa maxiyo wodee gakkin, bana gakkiyaagaa ekkidi yaana mala, ba ashkkarata ba kottaawatukko kiittiis.

English Sentences: And the husbandmen took his servants, and beat one, and killed another, and stoned another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kottaawati a ashkkarata oiqqidi, issuwaa wadhdhidosona; issuwaa woridi, qassi hinkkuwaa shuchchan caddidosona.

English Sentences: Again, he sent other servants more than the first: and they did unto them likewise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka he bitanee kaseegeetuppe dariya hara ashkkarata kiittiis; kottaawati he ashkkaratakka kaseegeetudan oottidosona.

English Sentences: But last of all he sent unto them his son, saying, They will reverence my son.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin wurssettan i, Ta na7aa eti bonchchana yaagidi ba na7aa etakko kiittiis.

English Sentences: But when the husbandmen saw the son, they said among themselves, This is the heir; come, let us kill him, and let us seize on his inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin kottaawati na7aa be7idi, bantta giddon, Gadiyaa laattanaagee hagaa; hinddite a woridi, gadiyaa nuuni laattoos yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they caught him, and cast him out of the vineyard, and slew him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7aa oiqqidi, woiniyaa turaa giddoppe gaxaa kessidi woridosona.

English Sentences: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh, what will he do unto those husbandmen?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi woiniyaa turaa godai yiyo wode, he kottaawata waatanee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: They say unto him, He will miserably destroy those wicked men, and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen, which shall render him the fruits in their seasons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin eti, "I he iita asata wori wurssidi, woiniyaa turai aifiyo wode bana gakkiyaagaa wodiyan sheedhdhiya hara kottaawatuyyo immana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto them, Did ye never read in the scriptures, The stone which the builders rejected, the same is become the head of the corner: this is the Lord's doing, and it is marvellous in our eyes?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Gimbbiyaageeti karidi ixxido shuchchai godaa xaphuwaa minttiya, ubbaappe aadhdhiya shuchcha gidiis. Hagee Godai oottidobaa; qassi nu aifiyaukka garamissiyaabaa yaagiyaagaa Xoossaa maxaafaappe mulekka nabbabibeekketii?

English Sentences: Therefore say I unto you, The kingdom of God shall be taken from you, and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, taani intteyyo odais; Xoossaa kawotettai intteppe ekettidi, lo77o aifiyaa immiya asau imettana.

English Sentences: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken: but on whomsoever it shall fall, it will grind him to powder.
Wolaitta Sentences: He shuchchaa bolli kunddiya ubbai meqerettana; qassi he shuchchai asa bolli kunddikko, he kunddido uraa gaaccana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables, they perceived that he spake of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti Yesuusi odido leemisuwaa siyido wode, banttabaa haasayiyoogaa eridosona.

English Sentences: But when they sought to lay hands on him, they feared the multitude, because they took him for a prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yesuusa oiqqanau koyidosona; shin Yesuusa daro asai hananabaa yootiyaagaa giidi qoppi uttido gishshau, he asau yayyidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables, and said,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asaayyo naa77anttuwaa leemisuwan hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis;

English Sentences: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king, which made a marriage for his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Saluwaa kawotettai ba na7aayyo bullachchaa makkida kawuwaa mala.

English Sentences: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding: and they would not come.
Wolaitta Sentences: He kawoi bullachchaa odi wottido asata xeesanau ba ashkkarata kiittiis; shin asati yaanau koyibookkona.

English Sentences: Again, he sent forth other servants, saying, Tell them which are bidden, Behold, I have prepared my dinner: my oxen and my fatlings are killed, and all things are ready: come unto the marriage.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi hara ashkkarata, Xeesettidaageeta, "Taani qumaa giigissaas; ta sanggatinne ta daddaroti shuhettidosona; ubbabaikka mahettiis. Bullachchaa haa yiite" yaagite yaagidi kiittiis.

English Sentences: But they made light of it, and went their ways, one to his farm, another to his merchandise:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin xeesettidaageeti koyennan ixxidi, bantta oosuwau oosuwau biidosona; issoi ba goshshau bin, hinkkoi ba zal77iyau biis.

English Sentences: And the remnant took his servants, and entreated them spitefully, and slew them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Attidaageeti qassi kawuwaa ashkkarata oiqqidi wadhdhidi woridosona.

English Sentences: But when the king heard thereof, he was wroth: and he sent forth his armies, and destroyed those murderers, and burned up their city.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kawoi daro hanqqettiis; qassi ba wotaaddarata yeddidi, he shemppuwaa woridaageeta worissidi, eta katamaa xuugissiis.

English Sentences: Then saith he to his servants, The wedding is ready, but they which were bidden were not worthy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, ba ashkkarata, Bullachchai mahettiis; shin xeesettidaageeti bullachchau bessiya asa gidokkona.

English Sentences: Go ye therefore into the highways, and as many as ye shall find, bid to the marriage.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, wogga ogiyaa biidi, intte demmido asa ubbaa bullachchau xeesite yaagiis.

English Sentences: So those servants went out into the highways, and gathered together all as many as they found, both bad and good: and the wedding was furnished with guests.
Wolaitta Sentences: He ashkkarati ogiyaa biidi, bantta demmido asa ubbaa lo77uwaa iitaa shiishshidi, bullachchaa daasiyaa kunttidosona.

English Sentences: And when the king came in to see the guests, he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment:
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin kawoi qumaa maanau uttida asaa be7anau gelido wode, bullachchaa maayuwaa maayibeenna issi bitaniyaa hegan be7idi,

English Sentences: And he saith unto him, Friend, how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment? And he was speechless.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta jaalau, bullachchaa maayuwaa maayennan waanada hagaa geladii? yaagin bitanee co77u giis.

English Sentences: Then said the king to the servants, Bind him hand and foot, and take him away, and cast him into outer darkness; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, kawoi ba ashkkarata, Ha bitaniyaa kushiyaanne tohuwaa qachchidi, kare xumaa kessi olite; i hegan yeekkananne achchaa garccana yaagiis.

English Sentences: For many are called, but few are chosen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aissi giikko, xeesettidaageeti daro; shin doorettidaageeti guutta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then went the Pharisees, and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Parisaaweti biidi, a haasayaappe bala demmidi, a oiqqana mala maqettidosona.

English Sentences: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians, saying, Master, we know that thou art true, and teachest the way of God in truth, neither carest thou for any man: for thou regardest not the person of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi bantta erissiyo ashkkaratuppenne Heeroodisa baggatuppe amaridaageeta akko kiittidosona. Kiittin eti, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, neeni tumaa haasayiyoogaanne Xoossaa ogiyaa tumatettan tamaarissiyoogaa nuuni eroos; aissi giikko, neeni asappe asa shaakkakkanne dummayakka.

English Sentences: Tell us therefore, What thinkest thou? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar, or not?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne qofai aibakko nuuyyo oda; nuuni Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaarayyo giiraa giiriyoogee wogeeyye woga gidennee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Jesus perceived their wickedness, and said, Why tempt ye me, ye hypocrites?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta iita qofaa eridi, "Ha lo77o milatiya iita asatoo, aissi tana paacceetii?

English Sentences: Shew me the tribute money. And they brought unto him a penny.
Wolaitta Sentences: Giiraa qanxxiyo miishshaa tana bessite" yaagiis. Yaagin eti santtimiyaa au ehiidosona.

English Sentences: And he saith unto them, Whose is this image and superscription?
Wolaitta Sentences: I, "Ha merainne sunttai oogee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They say unto him, Caesar's. Then saith he unto them, Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar's; and unto God the things that are God's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi eta oichchin, eti, "Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaaraagaa" yaagidosona. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi eta, "Yaatikko, Qeesaaraagaa Qeesaarassi, Xoossaagaa Xoossaassi immite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When they had heard these words, they marvelled, and left him, and went their way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa siyido wode, garamettidi a yeggi bayidi biidosona.

English Sentences: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection, and asked him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqida asi denddenna giya Saaduqaawetuppe issi issi asati he gallassi Yesuusakko yiidi, hagaadan yaagidi, a oichchidosona;

English Sentences: Saying, Master, Moses said, If a man die, having no children, his brother shall marry his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tamaarissiyaagoo, Muusee, Issi asi na7a yelennan haiqqikko, he haiqqidaagaa ishai a machchiyo aissidi, ba ishaayyo na7a yelanau bessees yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now there were with us seven brethren: and the first, when he had married a wife, deceased, and, having no issue, left his wife unto his brother:
Wolaitta Sentences: Nunaara laappun ishantti de7oosona; bairai machchiyo ekkidi, na7a yelennan haiqqiis; haiqqin a machchiyo a ishai aissiis.

English Sentences: Likewise the second also, and the third, unto the seventh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi naa77anttoikka haiqqiis; heezzanttoikka, laappuntta gakkanaashinkka hegaadan hanidosona.

English Sentences: And last of all the woman died also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe guyyiyan, he maccaasiyaa haiqqaasu.

English Sentences: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven? for they all had her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, haiqqida asai haiquwaappe denddiyo gallassi he maccaasiyaa laappunatuppe augaayyo machcho gidanee? Aissi giikko, laappunati ubbaikka o ekkidosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto them, Ye do err, not knowing the scriptures, nor the power of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Xoossaa maxaafata woi a wolqqaa intte erenna gishshau baleeta.

English Sentences: For in the resurrection they neither marry, nor are given in marriage, but are as the angels of God in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, haiqqida asai haiquwaappe denddiyo gallassi, saluwan de7iya kiitanchchatu mala gidanaappe attin, attumaasinne ekkenna; maccaasinne gelenna.

English Sentences: But as touching the resurrection of the dead, have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin haiqqidaageetu dendduwaabaa gidikko,

English Sentences: I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob? God is not the God of the dead, but of the living.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai, Taani Abrahaama Xoossaa, Yisaaqa Xoossaa, Yaaqooba Xoossaa yaagidi intteyyo odidoogaa mulekka nabbabibeekketii? Xoossai paxa de7iyaageetu Xoossaa gidiyoogaappe attin, haiqqidaageetu Xoossaa gidenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the multitude heard this, they were astonished at his doctrine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai hegaa siyidi, a timirttiyan garamettiis.

English Sentences: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence, they were gathered together.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi Saaduqaaweta co77u oottidoogaa Parisaaweti siyido wode, issisaa shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: Then one of them, which was a lawyer, asked him a question, tempting him, and saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta giddoppe higgiyaa tamaarissiya issoi, Yesuusa paaccanau issibaa oichchiis.

English Sentences: Master, which is the great commandment in the law?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tamaarissiyaagoo, higgiyaa giddon ubbaappe aadhdhiya azazoi augee?" yaagidi a oichchiis.

English Sentences: Jesus said unto him, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni Godaa ne Xoossaa ne kumetta wozanaappe, ne kumetta shemppuwaappe, ne kumetta qofaappe siiqa yaagiis.

English Sentences: This is the first and great commandment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee ubbaappe gitatiya azazonne qassi ubbaappe aadhdhiya azazo.

English Sentences: And the second is like unto it, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi naa77antto azazoikka a mala; hegee, Neeni ne shooruwaa ne huuphedan siiqa giyaagaa.

English Sentences: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muuse higge ubbainne hananabaa yootiyaageetu timirttee ha naa77u azazotun qashettees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: While the Pharisees were gathered together, Jesus asked them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaaweti issisaa shiiqidaashin Yesuusi eta,

English Sentences: Saying, What think ye of Christ? whose son is he? They say unto him, The son of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kiristtoosabaa woigi qoppeetii? I o na7ee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin eti, "Kiristtoosi Daawita na7aa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He saith unto them, How then doth David in spirit call him Lord, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Yaatin, Daawiti bana Geeshsha Ayyaanai haasayissin Kiristtoosa woigidi, Goda giidi xeesii?

English Sentences: The LORD said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand, till I make thine enemies thy footstool?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Daawiti, Godai ta Godaa, "Taani ne morkketa neeni yedhdha eqqiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi, hagan taappe ushachcha baggaara utta" giis yaagiis.

English Sentences: If David then call him Lord, how is he his son?
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Kiristtoosa, Godaa giidi xeesikko, yaatin, Kiristtoosi waanidi Daawita na7a gidii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And no man was able to answer him a word, neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusau issi qaala zaaranau danddayida issi asinne baawa; qassi he gallassappe doommin, hara oisha a oichchanau xalidai oonikka baawa.

English Sentences: Then spake Jesus to the multitude, and to his disciples,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi shiiqida asaayyoonne ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis;

English Sentences: Saying, The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses' seat:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti Muuse higgiyaa tamaarissiyo maataara de7oosona.

English Sentences: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe, that observe and do; but do not ye after their works: for they say, and do not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, intte oottana mala, eti inttena azaziyo ubbabaa oottitenne qassi naagite; shin eti oottiyoogaadan oottoppite; aissi giikko, eti bantta yootiyoogaa oottokkona.

English Sentences: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne, and lay them on men's shoulders; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tookkanau deexxiya toohuwaa eti qachchidi, asa toossoosona; shin bantta huuphen harai atto, he toohuwaa biradhdhiyan bochchanaukka koyokkona.

English Sentences: But all their works they do for to be seen of men: they make broad their phylacteries, and enlarge the borders of their garments,
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin eti bantta ooso ubbaa asi be7anaadan oottoosona; aissi giikko, bantta som77uwaaninne bantta kushiyaa qesiyan qachchiyo xiqisiyaara de7iya kitaafaa aassoosonanne bantta maayuwaa macaraakka adussoosona.

English Sentences: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts, and the chief seats in the synagogues,
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi banttana imattiyoosan bonchcho sohuwaa dosoosona; qassi Aihuda woosa keettatunkka daro lo77iya oidiyaa dosoosona.

English Sentences: And greetings in the markets, and to be called of men, Rabbi, Rabbi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi giyan banttana bonchchidi sarotanaagaanne Tamaarissiyaagoo giidi banttana xeesanaagaa koyoosona.

English Sentences: But be not ye called Rabbi: for one is your Master, even Christ; and all ye are brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin inttena tamaarissiyaagee issuwaa xalaala gidido gishshaunne intte ubbai ishantta gidido gishshau, issoi issuwaa, Tamaarissiyaagoo giidi xeesoppite.

English Sentences: And call no man your father upon the earth: for one is your Father, which is in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sa7an oonanne Aawa giidi xeesoppite; aissi giikko, intteyyo saluwan de7iya issi Aawai de7ees.

English Sentences: Neither be ye called masters: for one is your Master, even Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issoi issuwaa, Godau giidikka xeesoppite; aissi giikko, intteyyo issi Godai, Kiristtoosa xalaalai de7ees.

English Sentences: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte giddon ubbaappe gitatiyaagee intteyyo ashkkara gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bana gitayiya oonikka kauyyana; qassi bana kaushshiya oonikka gitatana.

English Sentences: But woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men: for ye neither go in yourselves, neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lo77o milatiya iitatoo, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo, asaayyo saluwaa kawotettaa intte gorddiyo gishshau, intteyyo aayye7ana; aissi giikko, intte huuphiyaunne gelekketa; qassi gelanau koyiyaageetanne gelissekketa.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayer: therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lo77o milatiya iitatoo, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo am77etu keettaa intte bonqqidi, intteyyo lo77o milatanau Xoossaa woosaa adusseeta; hegaa gishshau, intteyyo aayye7ana; ubbaappe aadhdhiya pirddaa intte ekkana.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte, and when he is made, ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lo77o milatiya iitatoo, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo intte issi uraa ammanttanau abbaaninne sa7an yuuyiyo gishshaunne qassi intte a ammanttiyo wode, he uraa intteegaappe naa77u kushe iitida Gaannabiyau na7a oottiyo gishshau, intteyyo aayye7ana.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, ye blind guides, which say, Whosoever shall swear by the temple, it is nothing; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple, he is a debtor!
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ooninne Beeta Maqidasiyan caaqqikko, aibinne baawa; shin Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya worqqan caaqqikko, he caaqoi a gakkees giya intteyyo qooqi uttidi asa kaalettiyaageetoo, intteyyo aayye7ana.

English Sentences: Ye fools and blind: for whether is greater, the gold, or the temple that sanctifieth the gold?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha eeyyati, ha qooqeti, worqqai aadhdhiiyye? Worqqaa geeshsha oottiya Beeta Maqidasee aadhdhii?

English Sentences: And, Whosoever shall swear by the altar, it is nothing; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it, he is guilty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi intte, Ooninne yarshsho yarshshiyooban caaqqikko, aikkokka baawa; shin ooninne a bolli de7iya yarshshon caaqqikko, he caaqoi a gakkees yaagidi tamaarisseeta.

English Sentences: Ye fools and blind: for whether is greater, the gift, or the altar that sanctifieth the gift?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha eeyyati, ha qooqeti, yarshshoi aadhdhiiyye? Woi yarshsho geeshsha oottiya a yarshshiyoobai aadhdhii?

English Sentences: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar, sweareth by it, and by all things thereon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, yarshsho yarshshiyooban caaqqiya urai he yarshshiyoobankka caaqqees; qassi a bolli de7iya ubbabankka caaqqees.

English Sentences: And whoso shall swear by the temple, sweareth by it, and by him that dwelleth therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyan caaqqiya urai, he Beeta Maqidasiyaaninne a giddon de7iya Xoossan caaqqees.

English Sentences: And he that shall swear by heaven, sweareth by the throne of God, and by him that sitteth thereon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwan caaqqiya urai, Xoossaa kawotaa araataaninne he araatan uttiyaagan caaqqees.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin, and have omitted the weightier matters of the law, judgment, mercy, and faith: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lo77o milatiya iitatoo, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo, intteyyo aayye7ana. Aissi giikko, karetta sawuwaappe, katikallaappenne okashiyaappe asirataa intte immeeta; shin higgiyan de7iya keehi koshshiyaageeta aggi bayeeta; hegeeti pirddaa, maarotettaanne xillotettaa. Haratakka aggennan, intte oottanau bessiya yohoti hegeeta.

English Sentences: Ye blind guides, which strain at a gnat, and swallow a camel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteyyo qooqi uttidi, asa kaalettiyaageetoo, intte ushshaappe udunxxiyaa gaccidi, gaameelaa mitteeta.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter, but within they are full of extortion and excess.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lo77o milatiya iitatoo, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo, intteyyo aayye7ana. Aissi giikko, intte shaatiyaayyoonne keriyaayyo bolla baggaa geeshsheeta; shin intteyyo giddoora bonqqiyoogeenne uuzettiyoogee kumi uttiis.

English Sentences: Thou blind Pharisee, cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter, that the outside of them may be clean also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha qooqe Parisaawiyau, shaatiyaayyoonne keriyaayyo garssaa kasetada geeshshargga; hegaappe guyyiyan, bolla baggaikka geeshsha gidana.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres, which indeed appear beautiful outward, but are within full of dead men's bones, and of all uncleanness.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lo77o milatiya iitatoo, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo, intteyyo aayye7ana. Aissi giikko, kare baggaara aannuwan tiyettidi, lo77i uttidi, qassi garssa baggaara haiqqida asa meqettinne wooqqidabai ubbabai kumido duufota milateeta.

English Sentences: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men, but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, qassi bolla baggaara asa ubbau xillo milateeta; shin intteyyo garssa baggaara lo77o milatiya iitatettainne makkalai kumi uttiis.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! because ye build the tombs of the prophets, and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lo77o milatiya iitatoo, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo, intteyyo aayye7ana. Aissi giikko, hananabaa yootiyaageetu duufuwaa bolli keettaa keexxeeta; qassi xillotu duufuwaakka loitteeta.

English Sentences: And say, If we had been in the days of our fathers, we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi intte, Nuuni beni nu aawatu wode de7idobaa gidiyaakko, etaara issippe hananabaa yootiyaageeta worokko shin yaageeta.

English Sentences: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves, that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gidikko, hananabaa yootiyaageeta woridaageetu naata intte gididoogaa intte huuphen markkatteeta.

English Sentences: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi intte aawati doommidoogaa polekketii!

English Sentences: Ye serpents, ye generation of vipers, how can ye escape the damnation of hell?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha shooshshatoo, shooshshaa naatoo, Gaannabiyaa pirddaappe waanidi attuuteetii?

English Sentences: Wherefore, behold, I send unto you prophets, and wise men, and scribes: and some of them ye shall kill and crucify; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues, and persecute them from city to city:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, be7ite, taani hananabaa yootiyaageeta, aadhdhida eranchchatanne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeta inttekko kiittais. Etappe issuwaa issuwaa intte worananne masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqana; qassi issuwaa issuwaa intte woosa keettatun lissuwan garafananne katamappe katama yedettana.

English Sentences: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth, from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias, whom ye slew between the temple and the altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, xilluwaa Aabeela woroosappe doommidi, Beeta Maqidasiyaappenne yarshshiyoosaappe gidduwan intte worido Baraakiyaa na7aa Zakkaariyaasa wodiyaa gakkanaassi, haiqqida xillo ubbatu suuttaa gishshau, intte qaxxayettana.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, All these things shall come upon this generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ha ubbabai ha wodiyaa asaa bolli gakkana.

English Sentences: O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, thou that killest the prophets, and stonest them which are sent unto thee, how often would I have gathered thy children together, even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings, and ye would not!
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yerusalaame katamaa asau, Yerusalaame katamaa asau, hananabaa yootiyaageeta intte woreeta; Xoossai inttekko kiittidoogeetakka shuchchan caddeeta; kuttiyaa ba marata ba qefiyan haphphiyoogaadan, taani intte asaa issi diri shiishshanau aapputoo koyidanaa! SHin tana diggideta.

English Sentences: Behold, your house is left unto you desolate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, intte keettai muleera ona gidana.

English Sentences: For I say unto you, Ye shall not see me henceforth, till ye shall say, Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani intteyyo odais; intte, Godaa sunttan yiyaagee anjjettidaagaa gaana gakkanaashin, naa77anttuwaa tana be7ekketa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus went out, and departed from the temple: and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kiyidi biishin, Beeta Maqidasiyaa dirssa giddon de7iya keettata bessanau erissiyo ashkkarati akko yiidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto them, See ye not all these things? verily I say unto you, There shall not be left here one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi eta, "Hagaa ubbaa be7eetii? Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ha keettatun de7iya issi shuchchinne attennan ubbai qolettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives, the disciples came unto him privately, saying, Tell us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign of thy coming, and of the end of the world?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Dabira Zaite giyo deriyaa bollan uttidaashin, erissiyo ashkkarati banttarkka akko yiidi a, "Hegee aude hananaakko, nuuyyo odarkkii; qassi ne yuussaayyoonne wodiyaa wurssettaayyo malaatai aiba gidanee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Take heed that no man deceive you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Inttena ooninne balettenna mala naagettite.

English Sentences: For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, daro asati ta sunttan, Taani Kiristtoosa yaagiiddi yaana; yiidi daro asaa balettana.

English Sentences: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled: for all these things must come to pass, but the end is not yet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Matan de7iya olaa cenggurssaanne haahuwan de7iya olaa oduwaa siyanau intte de7eeta; hegaa malabai hananau bessiyo gishshau, naagettite; hirggoppite; shin wurssettai biroona.

English Sentences: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be famines, and pestilences, and earthquakes, in divers places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, issi biittaa asai hara biittaa asaara olettana; qassi issi kawotettai hara kawotettaara olettana; koshainne biittaa qaattai ubbasan de7ana.

English Sentences: All these are the beginning of sorrows.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee ubbaikka koiro leesso mala.

English Sentences: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted, and shall kill you: and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Asai he wode inttena waissananne worana; ta sunttaa gishshau, dere ubbai inttena ixxana.

English Sentences: And then shall many be offended, and shall betray one another, and shall hate one another.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode daroti ammanuwaa aggana; bantta giddon issoi issuwaa aattidi immananne issoi issuwaa ixxana.

English Sentences: And many false prophets shall rise, and shall deceive many.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi wordduwaa hananabaa yootiya daroti denddidi, daro asaa cimmana.

English Sentences: And because iniquity shall abound, the love of many shall wax cold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Makkalai dariyo gishshau, daro asaa siiqoi irxxana.

English Sentences: But he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin wurssettaa gakkanaashin gencciya urai attana.

English Sentences: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations; and then shall the end come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa ubbau markka gidana mala, kawotettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi sa7a ubban odettana; hegaappe guyyiyan, wurssettai gakkana.

English Sentences: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, stand in the holy place, (whoso readeth, let him understand:)
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, hananabaa yootiya Daaneeli odido bashshaa tunatettai geeshsha sohuwan eqqidaagaa intte be7ana; hegee woigiyoogaakko, nabbabiyaagee akeeko.

English Sentences: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa biittan he wode de7iyaageeti deriyaakko baqatona.

English Sentences: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house:
Wolaitta Sentences: Keettaa huuphiyan de7iya uraikka ba son de7iyaabaa ekkanau wodhdhoppo.

English Sentences: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaden de7iyaagee ba maayuwaa ekkanau guyye simmoppo.

English Sentences: And woe unto them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode shahaara maccaasatuyyoonne xanttiya maccaasatuyyo aayye7ana.

English Sentences: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter, neither on the sabbath day:
Wolaitta Sentences: Balggon woi Sambbatan intte baqatenna mala, Xoossaa woossite;

English Sentences: For then shall be great tribulation, such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time, no, nor ever shall be.
Wolaitta Sentences: aissi giikko, sa7ai merettoosappe hachchi gakkanaashin de7ibeennabainne qassi hagaappe sinttaukka mule de7enna iita waayee he wode de7ana.

English Sentences: And except those days should be shortened, there should no flesh be saved: but for the elect's sake those days shall be shortened.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai he gallassatu qoodaa guuttiyoi bainnaakko, asa gididai ooninne attenna; shin i ba doorido asatu gishshau, he gallassatu qoodaa guuttana.

English Sentences: Then if any man shall say unto you, Lo, here is Christ, or there; believe it not.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode ooninne inttena, Be7ite. Kiristtoosi hagan de7ees woi, Hegan de7ees yaagikko abaa ammanoppite.

English Sentences: For there shall arise false Christs, and false prophets, and shall shew great signs and wonders; insomuch that, if it were possible, they shall deceive the very elect.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, worddanchcha Kiristtoosatinne wordduwaa hananabaa yootiyaageeti denddana; denddidi banttau danddayettikko, harai atto Xoossai dooridoogeetakka balettanau gita malaataanne garamissiyaabaa bessana.

English Sentences: Behold, I have told you before.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, taani intteyyo hegaa kasetada yootaas.

English Sentences: Wherefore if they shall say unto you, Behold, he is in the desert; go not forth: behold, he is in the secret chambers; believe it not.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, asai inttena, Be7ite, Kiristtoosi bazzon de7ees giikko, hegaa booppite; woi inttena, Be7ite, qol77on de7ees giikkokka, etabaa ammanoppite.

English Sentences: For as the lightning cometh out of the east, and shineth even unto the west; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, wolqqanttai arshshoppe wolqqammidi, arggo gakkanaassi phooliyoogaadan, ta yuussai, Asa Na7aa yuussai, hegaadan hanana.

English Sentences: For wheresoever the carcase is, there will the eagles be gathered together.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gauxai de7iyoosaa ankkoi shiiqana.

English Sentences: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light, and the stars shall fall from heaven, and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken:
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode waayiyaappe guyyiyan, sohuwaara awai xumana; aginai poo7iyoogaa aggi bayana; xoolintteti saluwaappe kunddana; qassi saluwan de7iya wolqqatikka qaaxettana.

English Sentences: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven: and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn, and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode ta malaatai, Asa Na7aa malaatai, saluwan beettana; sa7an he wode de7iya asa zare ubbai yeekkana. Qassi taani, Asa Na7ai, wolqqaaranne gita bonchchuwaara saluwaa shaara giddoora yiishin, eti be7ana.

English Sentences: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet, and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from one end of heaven to the other.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba kiitanchchata gita malkkataara kiittana; kiittin kiitanchchati sa7au ha gaxaappe ya gaxaa gakkanaashin, qassi sa7an oiddu zooziyaappe au doorettida asaa shiishshana.
