English Sentences: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When his branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is nigh:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Leemisuwaa balasiyo giyo mitteeppe akeekite; balasiyaa aaciyo wodenne i tashee bonccottiyo wode, bonee matattidoogaa intte erana.

English Sentences: So likewise ye, when ye shall see all these things, know that it is near, even at the doors.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, intte he ubbabaa be7iyo wode, i matattidi pengge shiiqidoogaa erite.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass, till all these things be fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ha ubbabai hanana gakkanaassi, ha wodiyaa asai haiqqiichchenna.

English Sentences: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloinne sa7ai aadhdhana; shin ta qaalai mulekka aadhdhenna.

English Sentences: But of that day and hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels of heaven, but my Father only.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin he gallassaanne he saatiyaa Aawaa xalaalaappe attin, harai atto saluwan de7iya kiitanchchata gidin, woi tana Na7aa gidinkka ooninne eriyaabi baawa.

English Sentences: But as the days of Noe were, so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta yuussai, Asa Na7aa yuussai, Nohe wode hanidoogaa mala gidana.

English Sentences: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, until the day that Noe entered into the ark,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, bashshiya haattaa yuussaappe kase wode, Nohee markkabiyan gelido gallassai gakkanaashin, asai meesinne uyees; qassi attumaasai machcheesinne maccaasai azinaa gelees.

English Sentences: And knew not until the flood came, and took them all away; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bashsha haattai yiidi, eta ubbaa efaana gakkanaashin, eti akeekibookkona; taani, Asa Na7ai, yiyo wodee, hegaa mala gidana.

English Sentences: Then shall two be in the field; the one shall be taken, and the other left.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode naa77u asati gaden oottiyaageetuppe issuwaa efaana; issoi attana.

English Sentences: Two women shall be grinding at the mill; the one shall be taken, and the other left.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77u maccaasati woxan gaacciyaageetuppe issinniyo efaana; issinniyaa attana.

English Sentences: Watch therefore: for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi intte Godai ai gallassi yaanaakkonne intte erenna gishshau, naagi uttite.

English Sentences: But know this, that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come, he would have watched, and would not have suffered his house to be broken up.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin kaisoi qammaappe woqqa wodiyan yaanaakko keettaawai eridaakko, ba keettai bookettenna mala, beegottidi naagi uttanaagaa erite.

English Sentences: Therefore be ye also ready: for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, inttekka giigi uttite; aissi giikko, taani, Asa Na7ai, intte qoppenna saatiyan yaana.

English Sentences: Who then is a faithful and wise servant, whom his lord hath made ruler over his household, to give them meat in due season?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaatin, ba so asau qumaa koshshiyo wodiyan immana mala, a godai sunttido ammanettida wozannaama ashkkari oonee?

English Sentences: Blessed is that servant, whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaadan oottishin, a godai yiidi demmiyo ashkkarai anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, That he shall make him ruler over all his goods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; godai he ashkkaraa babaa ubbaa bolli sunttana.

English Sentences: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart, My lord delayeth his coming;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ashkkarai iita gidikko, Ta godai gam77idi yaana yaagidi ba wozanan qoppidi,

English Sentences: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants, and to eat and drink with the drunken;
Wolaitta Sentences: ba lagge ashkkarata waraa doommikko, mattottiyaageetuura miikkonne uyikko,

English Sentences: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him, and in an hour that he is not aware of,
Wolaitta Sentences: he ashkkaraa godai i qoppibeenna gallassaaninne i eribeenna saatiyan yaana.

English Sentences: And shall cut him asunder, and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidi a qanxxerettidi, lo77o milatiya iita asati de7iyoosan wottana; hegan i yeekkananne achchaa garccana.

English Sentences: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins, which took their lamps, and went forth to meet the bridegroom.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode saluwaa kawotettai bantta kuraaziyaa oiqqidi, machchiyo bullachchiyaagaa mokkanau kare kiyida tammu geela7ota milatana.

English Sentences: And five of them were wise, and five were foolish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe ichchashati eeyya; qassi ichchashati cincca.

English Sentences: They that were foolish took their lamps, and took no oil with them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eeyyati bantta kuraaziyaa oiqqidosona; shin lambba oiqqibookkona.

English Sentences: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin cinccati bantta kuraaziyaanne xaaramusiyan lambbaa oiqqidosona.

English Sentences: While the bridegroom tarried, they all slumbered and slept.
Wolaitta Sentences: Machchiyo bullachchiyaagee yeennan gam77in, he geela7oti banttana xiskkissin zin77i bayidosona.

English Sentences: And at midnight there was a cry made, Behold, the bridegroom cometh; go ye out to meet him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Bilahe gidido wode, Be7ite, machchiyo bullachchiyaagee gakkiis; a mokkanau kare kiyite yaagiya gita cabboi denddiis.

English Sentences: Then all those virgins arose, and trimmed their lamps.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode he geela7oti ubbati beegottidi, bantta kuraaziyaa giigissidosona.

English Sentences: And the foolish said unto the wise, Give us of your oil; for our lamps are gone out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eeyyati cinccata, Nu kuraazee to77ana haniyo gishshau, intte lambbaappe nuuyyo immerkketii yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But the wise answered, saying, Not so; lest there be not enough for us and you: but go ye rather to them that sell, and buy for yourselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin cinccati zaaridi eta, CHii, nuuyyoonne intteyyo gidenna; hegaa gishshaa intteyyo baizziyaageetukko biidi shammi ekkite yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And while they went to buy, the bridegroom came; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage: and the door was shut.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eeyya geela7oti lambbaa shammanau biichchidaashin, machchiyo bullachchiyaagee puttu gin, giigi uttida ichchashu geela7oti aara issippe bullachchaa keettaa gelidosona; kareekka gorddetti aggiis.

English Sentences: Afterward came also the other virgins, saying, Lord, Lord, open to us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Guyyeppe qassi hinkko geela7oti yiidi, Godau, godau, nuuyyo dooyarkkii yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he answered and said, Verily I say unto you, I know you not.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin machchiyo bullachchiyaagee zaaridi, Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; taani inttena erikke yaagiis.

English Sentences: Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi taani, Asa Na7ai, yaana gallassaa woi saatiyaa intte erenna gishshau, naagi uttite.

English Sentences: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country, who called his own servants, and delivered unto them his goods.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aissi giikko, saluwaa kawotettai ba ashkkarata xeesidi, bau de7iyaabaa etau sheedhdhidi, oge baana haniya bitaniyaa milatees.

English Sentences: And unto one he gave five talents, to another two, and to another one; to every man according to his several ability; and straightway took his journey.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etau huuphiyan huuphiyan eta wolqqaa keenaa issuwau ichchashu sha7u biraa, issuwau naa77u sha7u biraa, qassi issuwau issi sha7u biraa immidi, ba ogiyaa biis.

English Sentences: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same, and made them other five talents.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ichchashu sha7u biraa ekkida ashkkarai sohuwaara biidi zal77idi, hara ichchashu sha7u biraa worissiis.

English Sentences: And likewise he that had received two, he also gained other two.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, qassi naa77u sha7u biraa ekkida ashkkarai hara naa77u sha7u biraa worissiis.

English Sentences: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth, and hid his lord's money.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin issi sha7u biraa ekkidaagee biidi, ollaa bookkidi, ba godaa miishshaa moogiis.

English Sentences: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh, and reckoneth with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Daro wodiyaappe guyyiyan, he ashkkaratu godai yiidi, ba miishshaa etaara qoodettiis.

English Sentences: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents, saying, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me five talents: behold, I have gained beside them five talents more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ichchashu sha7u biraa ekkida ashkkarai yiidi, hara ichchashu sha7u biraa sheedhdhiiddi, Ta godau, neeni tau ichchashu sha7u biraa immadasa; be7a, hara ichchashu sha7u biraa worissaas yaagiis.

English Sentences: His lord said unto him, Well done, thou good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: A godai a, Hayyanaashsho! Neeni lo77onne ammanettiya ashkkara; neeni guuttaban ammanettadasa. Taani nena darobaayyo alaafe oottana; haa gelada ne godaara ufaitta yaagiis.

English Sentences: He also that had received two talents came and said, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me two talents: behold, I have gained two other talents beside them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi naa77u sha7u biraa ekkidaageekka yiidi, Ta godau, neeni tau naa77u sha7u biraa immadasa; be7a, taani hara naa77u sha7u biraa worissaas yaagiis.

English Sentences: His lord said unto him, Well done, good and faithful servant; thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: A godai a, Hayyanaashsho! Neeni lo77onne ammanettiya ashkkara; neeni guuttaban ammanettadasa. Taani nena darobaayyo alaafe oottana; haa gelada ne godaara ufaitta yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then he which had received the one talent came and said, Lord, I knew thee that thou art an hard man, reaping where thou hast not sown, and gathering where thou hast not strawed:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi sha7u biraa ekkidaagee qassi yiidi, Ta godau, neeni zerabeennasaappe cakkiya asa gidiyoogaanne katta laalabeennasaappe maxiya meqetti bainna asa gidiyoogaa taani erais.

English Sentences: And I was afraid, and went and hid thy talent in the earth: lo, there thou hast that is thine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yayyaas; yaatada baada ne biraa biittan moogaas; be7a, ne birai hageeho yaagiis.

English Sentences: His lord answered and said unto him, Thou wicked and slothful servant, thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not, and gather where I have not strawed:
Wolaitta Sentences: "A godai zaaridi, a hagaadan yaagiis; Ha iita azalla ashkkarau, taani zerabeennasaappe cakkiya asa gidiyoogaanne katta laalabeennasaappe maxiya asa gidiyoogaa eradii?

English Sentences: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers, and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, neeni ta miishshaa bankkiyan wottidobaa gidiyaakko, taani simmiyo wode ta miishshaa woriyaara ekkanaagaa shin attiis.

English Sentences: Take therefore the talent from him, and give it unto him which hath ten talents.v
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, he miishshaa appe wotti ekkidi, tammu sha7u birai de7iyoogaayyo immite.

English Sentences: For unto every one that hath shall be given, and he shall have abundance: but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, de7iyo ubbau harai gujettana; i bau gidiyaagaappe darissidi ekkana; shin bainnaagaappe harai atto, he au de7iya guuttaikka appe ekettiichchana.

English Sentences: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Allaalle kessenna ashkkaraa kare xumaa kessi olite; hegan i yeekkananne ba achchaa garccana yaagiis.

English Sentences: When the Son of man shall come in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani, Asa Na7ai, kiitanchcha ubbatuura bonchchuwan yiyo wode, ta bonchcho kawotaa araatan uttana.

English Sentences: And before him shall be gathered all nations: and he shall separate them one from another, as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats:
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya asai ubbai ta sintti shiiqana; heemmiyaagee dorssata deeshshatuppe shaakkiyoogaadan, taani he asaa naa77u kessada shaakkana.

English Sentences: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand, but the goats on the left.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi dorssata taappe ushachcha baggaara essada, deeshshata taappe haddirssa baggaara essana.

English Sentences: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani kawoi taappe ushachcha baggaara de7iyaageeta hagaadan yaagana; Ta Aawai anjjidoogeetoo, haa yiidi sa7ai merettoosappe hachchi gakkanaashin, intteyyo giigida kawotettaa laattite.

English Sentences: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani namisettin mizideta; saamettin ushshideta; imatta gidada binkka mokkideta.

English Sentences: Naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani kallottin maizzideta; harggin be7ideta; qashettin taakko gakkideta yaagana.

English Sentences: Then shall the righteous answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, xilloti zaaridi, a hagaadan yaagana; Godau, neeni namisettin, aude be7idi mizidoo? Woi neeni saamettin, aude be7idi ushshidoo?

English Sentences: When saw we thee a stranger, and took thee in? or naked, and clothed thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni imatta gidada yin aude be7idi mokkidoo? Woi neeni kallottin aude maizzidoo?

English Sentences: Or when saw we thee sick, or in prison, and came unto thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi neeni harggin, woi qashettin neekko biidi aude nena be7idoo? yaagana.

English Sentences: And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani kawoi zaarada, Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; intte ha ta ishanttu ubbaappe harai atto, laafiya issuwaayyo oottidobaa gidikkokka, hegaa tau oottideta yaagana.

English Sentences: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand, Depart from me, ye cursed, into everlasting fire, prepared for the devil and his angels:
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode, taappe haddirssa baggaara de7iyaageeta taani yaagana; Ha qanggettidaageetoo, ta matappe kichchite; biidi xalahe halaqaayyoonne a kiitanchchatuyyo giigida merinaa taman gelite.

English Sentences: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me no meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me no drink:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani namisettin, tana mizibeekketa; saamettin ushshibeekketa.

English Sentences: I was a stranger, and ye took me not in: naked, and ye clothed me not: sick, and in prison, and ye visited me not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani imatta gidada bin, tana mokkibeekketa; kallottin maizzibeekketa; qassi harggin, qashettinkka tana be7ibeekketa yaagana.

English Sentences: Then shall they also answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, or athirst, or a stranger, or naked, or sick, or in prison, and did not minister unto thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: wode eti qassi hagaadan yaagidi zaarana; Godau, neeni namisettin woi saamettin, woi imatta gidada bin woi kallottin, woi harggin woi qashettin, aude be7idi, nena maaddennan ixxidonii? yaagana.

English Sentences: Then shall he answer them, saying, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these, ye did it not to me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode taani kawoi zaarada eta, Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; intte ha ubbaappe laafiya issuwaa maaddennan ixxidoogee, tana maaddennan ixxidoogaa yaagana.

English Sentences: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment: but the righteous into life eternal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeeti merinaa qaxxayuwau baana; shin xilloti merinaa de7uwau baana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Jesus had finished all these sayings, he said unto his disciples,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ha timirttiyaa ubbaa wurssido wode, ba erissiyo ashkkarata,

English Sentences: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover, and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Naa77u gallassappe guyyiyan, Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassa gidiyoogaa ereeta. He gallassi tana, Asa Na7aa, asai masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqanau aatti immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then assembled together the chief priests, and the scribes, and the elders of the people, unto the palace of the high priest, who was called Caiaphas,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode qeese halaqatinne dere cimati Qayaafa giyo qeese ubbatu halaqaa gita keettan shiiqidi,

English Sentences: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty, and kill him.
Wolaitta Sentences: asi erennan Yesuusa oiqqidi, woranau maqettidosona.

English Sentences: But they said, Not on the feast day, lest there be an uproar among the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti, "Asai ooshshaa kessenna mala, Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi hegaa oottokko" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Now when Jesus was in Bethany, in the house of Simon the leper,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Biitaaniyaa kataman inchchirichchaa harggiya Simoona son de7ishin,

English Sentences: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment, and poured it on his head, as he sat at meat.
Wolaitta Sentences: issi mishiriyaa albbasxxiroosa giyo shuchchaappe oottido bilqqaadiyaa kumida daro al77o shittuwaa ekkada yaasu; yaada qumaa i miishin, he shittuwaa Yesuusa huuphiyan tigaasu.

English Sentences: But when his disciples saw it, they had indignation, saying, To what purpose is this waste?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa be7idi hanqqettidosona; hanqqettidi, "Ha shittuwaa coo mooriyoogee aibissee?

English Sentences: For this ointment might have been sold for much, and given to the poor.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ha shittuwaa al77o waagan baizzidi, miishshaa hiyyeesau immanau danddayettees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus understood it, he said unto them, Why trouble ye the woman? for she hath wrought a good work upon me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eti giyoogaa eridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Ha maccaasiyo aissi waisseetii? A tau lo77obaa oottaasu.

English Sentences: For ye have the poor always with you; but me ye have not always.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiyyeesati ubba wode inttenaara de7oosona; shin taani inttenaara ubba wode de7ikke;

English Sentences: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body, she did it for my burial.
Wolaitta Sentences: a ha shittuwaa ta bolli tigiyoogee tana mooganau giigissanaassa.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world, there shall also this, that this woman hath done, be told for a memorial of her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; sa7a ubban ha wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa odiyoosan awaanikka, asai o hassayana mala, a oottidoogee odettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then one of the twelve, called Judas Iscariot, went unto the chief priests,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi Yihudaa Asqqorootu giyoogee qeese halaqatukko biis.

English Sentences: And said unto them, What will ye give me, and I will deliver him unto you? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi, "Taani intteyyo Yesuusa oittikko, tau ai immuuteetii?" yaagin eti ayyo hasttamu biraa qoppidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yihudai Yesuusa aattidi immanau injjetiya wodiyaa wochchees.

English Sentences: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus, saying unto him, Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover?
Wolaitta Sentences: Oittaa miyo gallassaa bonchchiyo koiro gallassi, erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko yiidi, "Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi neeni maana qumaa awan giigissanee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, Go into the city to such a man, and say unto him, The Master saith, My time is at hand; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta, "Katamaa biidi, issi bitaniyaa, Tamaarissiyaagee nena, "Tau wodee gakkiis; taani ta erissiyo ashkkaratuura Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassaa ne son aattana" yaagees yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them; and they made ready the passover.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi banttana azazidoogaadan oottidi, Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi maana qumaa giigissidosona.

English Sentences: Now when the even was come, he sat down with the twelve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omarido wode, Yesuusi tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuura qumaa maanau uttiis.

English Sentences: And as they did eat, he said, Verily I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti miishin, Yesuusi eta, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; intteppe issi urai tana aattidi immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they were exceeding sorrowful, and began every one of them to say unto him, Lord, is it I?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti daro dagammidi, huuphiyan huuphiyan, "Godau, tumu taneeshsha?" giyoogaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: And he answered and said, He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish, the same shall betray me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Ba kushiyaa tanaara issippe shaatiyan yeddidi tushkkiyaagee tana aattidi immana.

English Sentences: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him: but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! it had been good for that man if he had not been born.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, Asa Na7ai, Xoossaa maxaafai haiqqana giidoogaadan haiqqana; shin tana, Asa Na7aa, aattidi immiya urau aayye7ana; he urai yelettennan attiyaakko au keha shin" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Judas, which betrayed him, answered and said, Master, is it I? He said unto him, Thou hast said.
Wolaitta Sentences: A oittiya Yihudai zaaridi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, neeni giyoogee tanee?" yaagiis. Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi a, "Neeni ne huuphen gaadasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as they were eating, Jesus took bread, and blessed it, and brake it, and gave it to the disciples, and said, Take, eat; this is my body.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti miishin, Yesuusi oittaa ekkidi, Xoossaa galatiis; he oittaa menttidi, ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo immiiddi, "Heite; miite; hagee ta ashuwaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took the cup, and gave thanks, and gave it to them, saying, Drink ye all of it;
Wolaitta Sentences: Burccukkuwaa ekkidi, Xoossaa galatiis. Etau immiiddi, "Ubbai hagaappe uyite;

English Sentences: For this is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many for the remission of sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: aissi giikko, hagee daro asaa nagarai atto geetettana gishshau gukkiya ta suuttaa; ta suuttai ooratta maachchaa.

English Sentences: But I say unto you, I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine, until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father's kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani intteyyo odais; taani ta Aawaa kawotettan ooratta woine eessaa inttenaara uyana gallassai gakkanaashin, naa77anttuwaa ha woine eessaa mulekka uyikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they had sung an hymn, they went out into the mount of Olives.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mazamuriyaa yexxidoogaappe guyyiyan, Dabira Zaite giyo deriyaa biidosona.

English Sentences: Then saith Jesus unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wode eta, "Hachchi qammi intte ubbai tana yeggi bayidi baqatana; aissi giikko, Xoossaa maxaafai, Xoossai dorssaa heemmiyaagaa worana; worin dorssaa wudee laalettana yaagees.

English Sentences: But after I am risen again, I will go before you into Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan, intteppe kasetada Galiilaa baana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Peter answered and said unto him, Though all men shall be offended because of thee, yet will I never be offended.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi zaaridi, "Eti ubbati nena yeggi bayidi baqatikkokka, taani nena mulekka yeggikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, That this night, before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi PHeexiroosa, "Taani neeyyo tumaa odais; hachchi qammi kuttoi waassanaappe kase, neeni tana heezzutoo kaddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Peter said unto him, Though I should die with thee, yet will I not deny thee. Likewise also said all the disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHeexiroosi zaaridi, "Taani harai atto, nenaara issippe haiqqiyaakkokka, nena mulekka kaddikke" yaagiis. Qassi erissiyo ashkkarati ubbatikka hegaadan giidosona.

English Sentences: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane, and saith unto the disciples, Sit ye here, while I go and pray yonder.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wode ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura Geetesemaane giyo sohuwaa biidi eta, "Taani hiniyo baada Xoossaa woossishin, intte hagan uttiishshite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, and began to be sorrowful and very heavy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi PHeexiroosanne Zabddiyoosa naata naa77aa banaara ekki efiidi, daro kayyuwaanne waayiyaa doommiis.

English Sentences: Then saith he unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful, even unto death: tarry ye here, and watch with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eta, "Taani haiqqana gakkanaassikka kayyottais; hagan takkidi, tanaara naagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he went a little farther, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guuttaa sinttaukko shiiqiiddi, biittan gufannidi, "Ta Aawau, danddayettiyaabaa gidikko, ha burccukkuwaa taappe digga; shin neeni koyiyoogaadan hanoppe attin, taani koyiyoogaadan hanoppo" yaagidi Xoossaa woossiis.

English Sentences: And he cometh unto the disciples, and findeth them asleep, and saith unto Peter, What, could ye not watch with me one hour?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratukko simmidi yiis; xiskkidaageeta demmidi PHeexiroosa, "Intte issi saatekkonne xiskkennan tanaara naaganaukka danddayibeekketii?

English Sentences: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paaciyan intte gelenna mala, naagitenne Xoossaa woossite; ayyaanai giigi uttiis; shin ashoi daafuranchcha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: He went away again the second time, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if this cup may not pass away from me, except I drink it, thy will be done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassi naa77anttuwaa biidi, "Ta Aawau, taani ha burccukkuwaappe uyennan de7ishin burccukkuwaa denttanaagee danddayettennabaa gidikko, neeni koyiyoobai hano" yaagidi Xoossaa woossiis.

English Sentences: And he came and found them asleep again: for their eyes were heavy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka simmi yiidi, erissiyo ashkkaratu aifiyaa xiskkoi goozi wottido gishshau, xiskkidaageeta demmiis.

English Sentences: And he left them, and went away again, and prayed the third time, saying the same words.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka eta yeggi bayidi biidi, heezzanttuwaa kase qaaliyo zaarettidi, Xoossaa woossiis.

English Sentences: Then cometh he to his disciples, and saith unto them, Sleep on now, and take your rest: behold, the hour is at hand, and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, erissiyo ashkkaratukko yiidi, "Ha77i gakkanaashinkka xiskkeetiinne shemppeetii? Be7ite, tana, Asa Na7aa, nagaranchcha asatuyyo aattidi immiyo wodee gakkiis.

English Sentences: Rise, let us be going: behold, he is at hand that doth betray me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Denddidi hinddite; be7ite, tana aattidi immiyaagee hageeho gakkiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And while he yet spake, lo, Judas, one of the twelve, came, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and elders of the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa biron haasayishin, tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi, Yihudai, gakki wodhdhiis; qassi qeese halaqatinne dere cimati kiittin, bisuwaanne dullaa oiqqida daro asai aara issippe yiis.

English Sentences: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign, saying, Whomsoever I shall kiss, that same is he: hold him fast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa aattidi immiyaagee he daro asaa, "Taani yeriyoogee a; a oiqqite" yaagidi malaataa yooti wottiis.

English Sentences: And forthwith he came to Jesus, and said, Hail, master; and kissed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaarakka Yesuusakko shiiqidi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, saro de7ai" yaagidi a yeri ekkiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto him, Friend, wherefore art thou come? Then came they, and laid hands on Jesus, and took him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi a, "Ta jaalau, neeni oottanabaa ootta agga" yaagiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, he daro asai shiiqidi, Yesuusa mintti oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand, and drew his sword, and struck a servant of the high priest's, and smote off his ear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusaara de7iyaageetuppe issoi ba bisuwaa shoddinne qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaraa shocidi, a haittaa qanxxi oliis.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto him, Put up again thy sword into his place: for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wode a hagaadan yaagiis; "Ne bisuwaa a shoohuwan zaarada wotta; aissi giikko, biso shoddiya ubbai bison haiqqana.

English Sentences: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father, and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta Aawai daro sha7u kiitanchchata issi kuttan yeddidi, tana maaddana mala, taani a woossanau danddayiyoogaa erikkiiyye?

English Sentences: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled, that thus it must be?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Xoossaa maxaafati hagaadan hananau bessees yaagidoogee waanidi polettanau danddayii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes, Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple, and ye laid no hold on me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi he shiiqida daro asaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Tana pangga kessidi, pangga oiqqiyoogaadan oiqqanau bisonne dulla oiqqidi yiidetii? Taani Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissaidda, gallassi gallassi inttenaara oottiyo wode tana oiqqibeekketa;

English Sentences: But all this was done, that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled. Then all the disciples forsook him, and fled.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin hagee ubbai hanidoogee hananabaa yootiyaageeti Xoossaa maxaafatun xaafidoogee polettanaassa" yaagiis. Erissiyo ashkkarati he wode ubbati a yeggi bayidi baqatidosona.

English Sentences: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest, where the scribes and the elders were assembled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa oiqqidaageeti qeese ubbatu halaqaa Qayaafakko, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne cimati shiiqidosaa ekki efiidosona.

English Sentences: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest's palace, and went in, and sat with the servants, to see the end.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi qeese ubbatu halaqaa dirssa giddo gakkanaashin, haahuwan a kaalliis; yohuwaa wurssettaa be7anau dirssa giddo gelidi, naagiyaageetuura utti bayiis.

English Sentences: Now the chief priests, and elders, and all the council, sought false witness against Jesus, to put him to death;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqatinne yaa7aa asai ubbai Yesuusa woranau a bolli worddo markka demmanau koyidosona.

English Sentences: But found none: yea, though many false witnesses came, yet found they none. At the last came two false witnesses,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin harai atto daroti yiidi, a bolli wordduwaa markkattinkka appe ainne demmibookkona. Guyyeppe naa77ati yiidi,

English Sentences: And said, This fellow said, I am able to destroy the temple of God, and to build it in three days.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha bitanee, Taani Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolada, heezzu gallassan zaaretta keexxanau danddayais yaagiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the high priest arose, and said unto him, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese ubbatu halaqai denddi eqqidi Yesuusa, "Hageeti nena mootiyo mootuwau neeyyo zaariyoobi baawee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But Jesus held his peace. And the high priest answered and said unto him, I adjure thee by the living God, that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ, the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi co77u giis; qassikka qeese ubbatu halaqai a, "Taani nena de7o Xoossaa sunttan callais; neeni Xoossaa Na7aa Kiristtoosa gidikko nuussi oda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto him, Thou hast said: nevertheless I say unto you, Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power, and coming in the clouds of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Neeni ne huuphenkka gaadasa; shin taani intteyyo odais; hagaappe sinttan, intte tana, Asa Na7aa, wolqqaama Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttidaashiininne saluwaa shaaraara yiishin be7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the high priest rent his clothes, saying, He hath spoken blasphemy; what further need have we of witnesses? behold, now ye have heard his blasphemy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, qeese ubbatu halaqai ba maayuwaa pooshshi olidi, "Hagee cayiichchiis; nuna hagaappe sinttan aissi hara markka koshshii? I ha77i cayiyoogaa intte siyideta.

English Sentences: What think ye? They answered and said, He is guilty of death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte qofai aibee?" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Au haiqoi bessees" yaagidi zaaridosona.

English Sentences: Then did they spit in his face, and buffeted him; and others smote him with the palms of their hands,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, eti a som77uwan cuchchidi, a dechchidosona; harati qassi a baqqidi,

English Sentences: Saying, Prophesy unto us, thou Christ, Who is he that smote thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kiristtoosaa! Nena dechchidai oonee? Ane nuuyyo hananabaa yoota" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Now Peter sat without in the palace: and a damsel came unto him, saying, Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi keettaappe kareera dirssa giddon uttidaashin, issi ashkkariyaa akko yaada, "Neenikka Galiilaa Yesuusaara issippe de7aasa" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: But he denied before them all, saying, I know not what thou sayest.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i eta ubbaa sinttan he ashkkariyo, "Neeni giyoobai aibakko taani erikke" yaagidi kaddiis.

English Sentences: And when he was gone out into the porch, another maid saw him, and said unto them that were there, This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi biidi dirssaa penggekko kiyishin, hara ashkkariyaa a be7ada, hegan de7iya asatuyyo, "Ha bitanee Naazireeta Yesuusaara de7ees" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And again he denied with an oath, I do not know the man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHeexiroosi naa77anttuwaa caaqqidi, "Taani hegaa bitaniyaa erikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And after a while came unto him they that stood by, and said to Peter, Surely thou also art one of them; for thy speech bewrayeth thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guuttaa gam77ishin, hegan eqqida asati PHeexiroosakko yiidi, "Neenikka tuma etaara issippe de7aasa; aissi giikko, neeni haasayiyo haasayaikka nena erissees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then began he to curse and to swear, saying, I know not the man. And immediately the cock crew.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan PHeexiroosi, "Taani hegaa bitaniyaa erikke!" yaagidi, bana qanggettaanne caaquwaa doommiis. He wode sohuwaarakka kuttoi waassi aggiis.

English Sentences: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus, which said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice. And he went out, and wept bitterly.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi bana Yesuusi, "Neeni kuttoi waassanaappe kase heezzutoo tana kaddana" giidoogaa hassayidi, kare kiyidi, mishettidi yeekkiis.

English Sentences: When the morning was come, all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death:
Wolaitta Sentences: Maallado guuraara qeese halaqati ubbatinne dere cimati Yesuusa woranau maqettidosona;

English Sentences: And when they had bound him, they led him away, and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor.
Wolaitta Sentences: eti Yesuusa qachchidi efiidi, deriyaa haariya PHenxxeniyaa PHilaaxoosayyo aattidi immidosona.

English Sentences: Then Judas, which had betrayed him, when he saw that he was condemned, repented himself, and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa he wode oittida Yihudai PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa bolli pirddidoogaa be7idi, "Aayye7ana! Oittennan aggarkkinaashsha!" yaagidi, he hasttamu biraa qeese halaqatuyyoonne dere cimatuyyo guyye zaaridi,

English Sentences: Saying, I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood. And they said, What is that to us? see thou to that.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani geeshsha asa oittada nagaraa oottaas" yaagiis. SHin eti a, "Hegee nuuyyo ai metoo? Hegee ne shene" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple, and departed, and went and hanged himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai biraa Beeta Maqidasiyan oli bayiis; eta matappe aggidi biidi, suletti haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And the chief priests took the silver pieces, and said, It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury, because it is the price of blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqati biraa ekkidi, "Ha birai suutta miishsha gidishin, nuuni Beeta Maqidasiyaa miishshaara gattiyoogee higge gidenna" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they took counsel, and bought with them the potter's field, to bury strangers in.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi issippe zorettidi, asa biitta asayyo moogo gade oottanau urqqa miishsha medhdhiyaageetu gadiyaa shammidosona.

English Sentences: Wherefore that field was called, The field of blood, unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, he gadee hachchi gakkanaassikka, suutta gade geetettidi xeesettees.

English Sentences: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet, saying, And they took the thirty pieces of silver, the price of him that was valued, whom they of the children of Israel did value;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasi, "Eti Israa7eela asai au qanxxanau qoppido hasttamu xaqara biraa ekkidi,

English Sentences: And gave them for the potter's field, as the Lord appointed me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai tana azazidoogaadan, urqqa miishsha medhdhiyaageetu biittaa shammanau immidosona" giidoogee he wode polettiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus stood before the governor: and the governor asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And Jesus said unto him, Thou sayest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi deriyaa haariyaagaa sintti shiiqin, deriyaa haariyaagee a, "Neeni Aihudatu kawoo?" yaagidi oichchiis. Yesuusi a, "Neenikka gaasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders, he answered nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqatinne dere cimati a mootin, etau ainne zaaro immibeenna.

English Sentences: Then said Pilate unto him, Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa, "Hageeti nena mootiyoobaa ubbaa siyikkii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he answered him to never a word; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi harai atto, issi qaalakka zaarennan ixxin, deriyaa haariyaagee daro garamettiis.

English Sentences: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner, whom they would.
Wolaitta Sentences: Deriyaa haariyaagee Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassan, asai koyiyo issi uraa qashuwaappe birshshiyo meezee de7ees.

English Sentences: And they had then a notable prisoner, called Barabbas.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode issi Barbbaana giyo daro erettida iita asi qasho keettan de7ees.

English Sentences: Therefore when they were gathered together, Pilate said unto them, Whom will ye that I release unto you? Barabbas, or Jesus which is called Christ?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, daro asai issisaa shiiqidaashin PHilaaxoosi, "Taani intteyyo Barbbaana birshshooyye, woi Kiristtoosa giyo Yesuusa birshshoo?" yaagidi asaa oichchiis.

English Sentences: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti qanaatidi Yesuusa oittidoogaa i erees.

English Sentences: When he was set down on the judgment seat, his wife sent unto him, saying, Have thou nothing to do with that just man: for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi pirdda keettan uttidaashin, a machchiyaa ayyo, "He xillo bitaniyaa ainne oottoppa; aissi giikko, taani hachchi qammi aimuwan aban daro waayettaas" yaagada kiittaasu.

English Sentences: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas, and destroy Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qeese halaqatinne dere cimati PHilaaxoosi Barbbaana birshshidi, Yesuusa woranaadan, shiiqida asai a woossana mala, asaa cimmidosona.

English Sentences: The governor answered and said unto them, Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you? They said, Barabbas.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi zaaridi eta, "Taani eta naa77aappe intteyyo oona birshshanau koyeetii?" yaagin eti, "Barbbaana birshshanau koyoos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Pilate saith unto them, What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ? They all say unto him, Let him be crucified.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi, "Yaatin, Kiristtoosa giyo Yesuusa waatoo?" yaagidi eta oichchin ubbai, "Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqetto" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the governor said, Why, what evil hath he done? But they cried out the more, saying, Let him be crucified.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi asaa, "Aissi? Ai iitabaa oottidee?" yaagiis. SHin asai kaseegaappekka ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi i kaqetto" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing, but that rather a tumult was made, he took water, and washed his hands before the multitude, saying, I am innocent of the blood of this just person: see ye to it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooshshi denddanaagaappe attin, aibinne polettennaagaa PHilaaxoosi be7idi, haattaa ekkidi, "Ha bitanee haiqqiyooban taani gelikke; hegaa intte erite" yaagidi shiiqida asaa sinttan ba kushiyaa meecettiis.

English Sentences: Then answered all the people, and said, His blood be on us, and on our children.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiiqida asai ubbai zaaridi, "A suuttaa gomee nunanne nu naata gakko" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then released he Barabbas unto them: and when he had scourged Jesus, he delivered him to be crucified.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, PHilaaxoosi Barbbaana etau birshshiis; birshshidi lissuwan Yesuusa garafidi, masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqanau etau aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall, and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, PHilaaxoosa wotaaddarati Yesuusa deriyaa haariyaagaa ooso keettaa ekki efin, wotaaddarati ubbai a lanqqiyan yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqidosona.

English Sentences: And they stripped him, and put on him a scarlet robe.
Wolaitta Sentences: A afalaa qaari ekkidi, zo7o afalaa a maizzidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had platted a crown of thorns, they put it upon his head, and a reed in his right hand: and they bowed the knee before him, and mocked him, saying, Hail, King of the Jews!
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi agunttaa akiliiliyaa giigissidi, a huuphiyan wottidosona; a ushachcha kushiyan shombboqo gatimaa oittidi, a sinttan gulbbatidi, "Aihudatu kawuwau, saro de7ai!" yaagidi, a bolli qilliiccidosona.

English Sentences: And they spit upon him, and took the reed, and smote him on the head.
Wolaitta Sentences: A bolli cuchchidosona; he shombboqo gatimaa ekkidi, a huuphiyaa shocidosona.

English Sentences: And after that they had mocked him, they took the robe off from him, and put his own raiment on him, and led him away to crucify him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a bolli qilliiccidoogaappe guyyiyan, zo7o afalaa appe qaari ekkidi, a afalaa a maizzidosona; qassi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi a kaqqanau ekki efiidosona.

English Sentences: And as they came out, they found a man of Cyrene, Simon by name: him they compelled to bear his cross.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kare kiyiiddi, issi Simoona giyo Qareena biitta asa demmidi, Yesuusa masqqaliyaa wolqqan toossidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha, that is to say, a place of a skull,
Wolaitta Sentences: Golggottaa giyoosaa gakkidosona. "Golggottaa" giyoogee "Guuggiyaa Sohuwaa" giyoogaa.

English Sentences: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall: and when he had tasted thereof, he would not drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan eti ciyyee walahettido woine eessaa Yesuusayyo uyanau immidosona; immin i hegaa ganxxi xeellidi, uyennan ixxiis.

English Sentences: And they crucified him, and parted his garments, casting lots: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet, They parted my garments among them, and upon my vesture did they cast lots.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi a kaqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, a afalaa shaakkidi, saamaa yeggidi ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And sitting down they watched him there;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, a naaganau hegan utti bayidosona.

English Sentences: And set up over his head his accusation written, THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi, "Hagee Aihudatu Kawuwaa Yesuusa" yaagidi mootiyo xifatiyaa a huuphessaara wottidosona.

English Sentences: Then were there two thieves crucified with him, one on the right hand, and another on the left.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusaara he wode naa77u panggata issuwaa appe ushachcha baggaara, qassi issuwaa appe haddirssa baggaara, masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqidosona.

English Sentences: And they that passed by reviled him, wagging their heads,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ogiyaara aadhdhiya asai Yesuusa karidi, ba huuphiyaa qaattiiddi cayiis.

English Sentences: And saying, Thou that destroyest the temple, and buildest it in three days, save thyself. If thou be the Son of God, come down from the cross.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolada heezzu gallassa giddon keexxiyaagoo, ne huuphiyaa ashsha; neeni Xoossaa Na7a gidikko, ane masqqaliyaa bollappe wodhdha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him, with the scribes and elders, said,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, qeese halaqati higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuuranne cimatuura issippe Yesuusa bolli qilliicciiddi, hagaadan yaagidosona;

English Sentences: He saved others; himself he cannot save. If he be the King of Israel, let him now come down from the cross, and we will believe him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Harata ashshiis; shin bana ashshanau danddayenna. I Israa7eela kawo; ane masqqaliyaa bollappe ha77i wodhdho; nuunikka qassi a ammanana.

English Sentences: He trusted in God; let him deliver him now, if he will have him: for he said, I am the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossan i ammanettees; Xoossai a ashshana koyikko ane ashsho; aissi giikko, i bana, Taani Xoossaa Na7aa gees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: The thieves also, which were crucified with him, cast the same in his teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi harai atto, aara masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettida panggatikka hegaadan giidi, a bolli qilliiccidosona.

English Sentences: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Usuppun saateppe doommidi, uddufun saate gakkanaashin, biitta ubbai xumiis.

English Sentences: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani? that is to say, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Uddufun saate gidiyo heeran Yesuusi ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Elohee, Elohee, laamaa sabaqitaanii?" yaagiis. Hegaa giyoogee, "Ta Xoossau, ta Xoossau, tana aissi aggadii?" giyoogaa.

English Sentences: Some of them that stood there, when they heard that, said, This man calleth for Elias.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan eqqida asaappe issoi hegaa siyidi, "Ha bitanee Eelaasa xeesees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And straightway one of them ran, and took a spunge, and filled it with vinegar, and put it on a reed, and gave him to drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara etappe issoi woxxidi, gombbilla mala ispponjjiyaa ekkidi, caala woine eessaa kunttiis; hegaa shombboqo gatimaa xeeran wottidi, ushshanau a doonaakko shiishshiis.

English Sentences: The rest said, Let be, let us see whether Elias will come to save him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hankkooti, "Nangga, Eelaasi a ashshanau yaanaakkonne be7oos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus, when he had cried again with a loud voice, yielded up the ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi naa77anttuwaa ba qaalaa xoqqu ootti waassidi, haiqqi bayiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom; and the earth did quake, and the rocks rent;
Wolaitta Sentences: Akeekite; Beeta Maqidasiyan kaqettida magalashoi qommoppe duge gakkanaassi, naa77u kiyidi, pooshetti wodhdhiis; biittai qaaxxiis. Qassi zaallaikka phalqqettiis;

English Sentences: And the graves were opened; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose,
Wolaitta Sentences: duufoti dooyettidosona. Xoossaa asatuppe daroti haiqqidaageeti, haiquwaappe denddidosona.

English Sentences: And came out of the graves after his resurrection, and went into the holy city, and appeared unto many.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti duufuwaappe kiyidi, Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan, geeshsha katamaa biidosona; hegan eta daro asai be7iis.

English Sentences: Now when the centurion, and they that were with him, watching Jesus, saw the earthquake, and those things that were done, they feared greatly, saying, Truly this was the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mato halaqainne aara Yesuusa naagiya wotaaddarati biittai qaaxxiyoogaanne hegan hanidabaa ubbaa be7ido wode daro yayyidosona; yayyidi, "Tumu hagee Xoossaa Na7aa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And many women were there beholding afar off, which followed Jesus from Galilee, ministering unto him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan daro maccaasati, Galiilappe doommidi, Yesuusa maaddiiddi kaallidaageeti, haahuwan eqqidi xeelloosona.

English Sentences: Among which was Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James and Joses, and the mother of Zebedee's children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta giddon Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama, Yaaqoobanne Yooseefa aayyiyaa Mairaamanne Zabddiyoosa naatu aayyiyaa de7oosona.

English Sentences: When the even was come, there came a rich man of Arimathaea, named Joseph, who also himself was Jesus' disciple:
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omariyo wode, Yooseefa giyo issi dure bitanee, Armmaatiyaasa katamaa asi yiis; i ba huuphenkka Yesuusa kaalliyaagaa.

English Sentences: He went to Pilate, and begged the body of Jesus. Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi PHilaaxoosakko biidi, Yesuusa ahaa ekkanau woossiis; woossin PHilaaxoosi Yooseefayyo imettana mala azaziis.

English Sentences: And when Joseph had taken the body, he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa ahaa ekkidi, geeshsha moogo afalan xaaxiis.

English Sentences: And laid it in his own new tomb, which he had hewn out in the rock: and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre, and departed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaaxidi baayyo moogettanau shuchchaa woocido ooratta gonggoluwaa giddon a ahaa wottiis; qassi he gonggoluwaa doonan gita shuchchaa gonddorssi wottidi, aggi bayidi biis.

English Sentences: And there was Mary Magdalene, and the other Mary, sitting over against the sepulchre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaamanne hinkko Mairaama hegan gonggoluwaakko simmidi uttidosona.

English Sentences: Now the next day, that followed the day of the preparation, the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate,
Wolaitta Sentences: Sambbataassi giigettiyo gallassaappe wonttetta gallassi, qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti PHilaaxoosaara gaittidi, hagaadan yaagidosona;

English Sentences: Saying, Sir, we remember that that deceiver said, while he was yet alive, After three days I will rise again.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Godau, he worddoi paxa de7iyo wode, Taani heezzu gallassappe guyyiyan, haiquwaappe denddana yaagidoogaa nuuni hassayida.

English Sentences: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day, lest his disciples come by night, and steal him away, and say unto the people, He is risen from the dead: so the last error shall be worse than the first.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, a moogido gonggoluwaa heezzu gallassa gakkanaassi, mintti naagana mala azazarkkii; hegee xayikko erissiyo ashkkarati biidi, a ahaa wuuqqidi asaayyo, Haiquwaappe denddiis yaagana; yaagin naa77antto worddoi kase wordduwaappe ubba yaa palattana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Pilate said unto them, Ye have a watch: go your way, make it as sure as ye can.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi eta, "Intteyyo naagiyaageeti de7oosona; biidi intte danddayiyoogaa keenaa naagissite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So they went, and made the sepulchre sure, sealing the stone, and setting a watch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti biidi, shuchchaa bolli maatafaa attamidi, qassi naagiyaagaa yaani wottidi, Yesuusa moogido gonggoluwaa naagissidosona.

English Sentences: In the end of the sabbath, as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week, came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sambbatai aadhdhin Woggaa gallassi sa7ai wonttishin, Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaamanne hinkko Mairaama Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaa be7anau biidosona.

English Sentences: And, behold, there was a great earthquake: for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven, and came and rolled back the stone from the door, and sat upon it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa kiitanchchai saluwaappe wodhdhido gishshau, biittai daro qaaxxiis; he kiitanchchai yiidi, shuchchaa gonddorssi olidi, a bolli kiyi uttiis.

English Sentences: His countenance was like lightning, and his raiment white as snow:
Wolaitta Sentences: A merai wolqqantta milatees; a maayoikka shachchaadan bootta.

English Sentences: And for fear of him the keepers did shake, and became as dead men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naagiyaageeti kiitanchchau yashshaa kokkoridi, haiqqida asadan hanidosona.

English Sentences: And the angel answered and said unto the women, Fear not ye: for I know that ye seek Jesus, which was crucified.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchai maccaasata hagaadan yaagiis; "Yayyoppite; aissi giikko, masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqido Yesuusa intte koyiyoogaa taani erais.

English Sentences: He is not here: for he is risen, as he said. Come, see the place where the Lord lay.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hagan baawa; aissi giikko, i ba giidoogaadankka haiquwaappe denddiichchiis; haa yiidi, i zin77idosaa be7ite.

English Sentences: And go quickly, and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead; and, behold, he goeth before you into Galilee; there shall ye see him: lo, I have told you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ha77i eesuwan biidi, Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo, Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddiichchiis. Qassi i intteppe kasetidi, Galiilaa bees; intte a yaani be7ana yaagidi odite. Be7ite, taani intteyyo odaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy; and did run to bring his disciples word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yayyiiddinne qassi daro ufaittiiddi, Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaa matappe eesuwan aggidi, erissiyo ashkkaratukko odanau woxxidosona.

English Sentences: And as they went to tell his disciples, behold, Jesus met them, saying, All hail. And they came and held him by the feet, and worshipped him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara Yesuusi etaara gaittinne eta, "Saro de7eetii" yaagi aggiis; eti akko shiiqidi, a tohuwaa oiqqidi, ayyo goinnidosona.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto them, Be not afraid: go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee, and there shall they see me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wode eta, "Yayyoppite; ta ishantti Galiilaa baana mala, biidi etau yootite; eti tana yaani be7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now when they were going, behold, some of the watch came into the city, and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done.
Wolaitta Sentences: He maccaasati biishin, gonggoluwaa naagiya wotaaddaratuppe amaridaageeti katamaa biidi, hanidabaa ubbaa qeese halaqatuyyo odidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were assembled with the elders, and had taken counsel, they gave large money unto the soldiers,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqati cimatuura issippe shiiqi zorettidi, wotaaddaratuyyo daro miishshaa immidi,

English Sentences: Saying, Say ye, His disciples came by night, and stole him away while we slept.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nuuni xiskkidaashin erissiyo ashkkarati qammi yiidi, a ahaa wuuqqidosona yaagite;

English Sentences: And if this come to the governor's ears, we will persuade him, and secure you.
Wolaitta Sentences: ha yohuwaa deriyaa haariyaagee siyikko, nuuni ayyo yooti maizzana; qassi inttena aibinne hirggissennaadan oottana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So they took the money, and did as they were taught: and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wotaaddarati miishshaa ekkidi, banttau odidoogaadan oottidosona. Ha yohoi Aihudatu matan hachchi gakkanaashinkka, odettiiddi de7ees.

English Sentences: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee, into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin tammanne isiini erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi banttana biite giido Galiila Deriyaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And when they saw him, they worshipped him: but some doubted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi a be7ido wode ayyo goinnidosona; shin etappe issooti issooti siridosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etakko shiiqidi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Maata ubbai saluwaaninne sa7an taayyo imettiis.

English Sentences: Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, intte biidi, asa ubbaa tana kaalliyaageeta oottite; Aawaa sunttan, Na7aa sunttaaninne Geeshsha Ayyaanaa sunttan eta xammaqite.

English Sentences: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena azazidobaa ubbaa eti naagana mala, eta tamaarissite; taani wodiyaa wurssettai gakkanaassikka ubba wode inttenaara de7iyoogaa akeekite" yaagiis.
